original: CONVERTING
translation: 转变

original: Humiliated Family
translation: 被羞辱的家庭

original: Humiliated Close Kin
translation: 羞辱了近亲

original: Mercenary Band
translation: 雇佣兵军团

original: §BHorse Lords:§! Nomad Stability
translation: §B「马上之王」：§! 游牧稳定度

original: Unstable
translation: 不稳定

original: Upon succession of the Khagan, vassals of Nomadic hordes have a chance to declare independence. The succeeding ruler will have just cause to reclaim the land.
translation: 游牧部落的封臣在可汗的继承中有机会宣布独立。后续统治者则可以正当地重新宣称其土地。

original: Stable
translation: 稳定

original: Nomad vassals will NOT have the opportunity to go independent on succession of the Khagan.
translation: 游牧封臣在可汗的继承中没有机会独立。

original: De Jure Requirement
translation: 法理要求

original: Titles with De Jure land will be kept regardless of the circumstances.
translation: 有法理领地的头衔无论何种情况都会被保留。

original: Required
translation: 必须拥有

original: Titles with De Jure land will eventually be destroyed if a character holds no De Jure land of the title within their realm.
translation: 如果一个角色在其领地中不拥有某头衔下的任何法理领地，那么这个头衔最终会被销毁。

original: As you hold no De Jure land within the [title_to_destroy.GetTier] of [title_to_destroy.GetName] you can no longer rightfully claim to be its ruler. You are now regarded as a mere claimant to a throne outside your reach.
translation: 鉴于你并不持有[title_to_destroy.GetName][title_to_destroy.GetTier]内的任一法理领地，你不再能够名正言顺地自称为此头衔的统治者。你现在仅被视为对此不在你掌控下的头衔的弱宣称者。

original: But [title_to_destroy.GetName] was to be mine!
translation: 但[title_to_destroy.GetName]终将回到我手中！

original: The tumultuous death of [From.GetFullName] presents an excellent opportunity for us to declare our independence. Of course, [nomadic_heir.GetFullName] might strike at us with vengeance for defying [nomadic_heir.GetHerHis] rule...
translation: [From.GetFullName]之死的喧嚣给了我们一个绝佳的机会去宣布独立。当然，[nomadic_heir.GetFullName]可能会向我们发起攻击以报复我们拒斥[nomadic_heir.GetHerHis]统治……

original: No, we shall stay loyal.
translation: 不，我们应继续效忠。

original: We are masters of our own destiny!
translation: 我们是自己命运的主人！

original: My former subject, [From.GetFirstName], has chosen independence from my rule.
translation: 我曾经的臣属，[From.GetFirstName]，已经宣布脱离我的统治，选择独立。

original: I shall have their heads!
translation: 我要他们的脑袋！

original: AI rulers will be eligible to receive supernatural events such as the Demon Child, Wolf's Blood and Immortality event chains.
translation: AI统治者可以获得超自然事件如恶魔之子、狼人之血和永生不朽事件链。

original: [invited_character.GetFullName] has arrived at your court, ready for employment.
translation: [invited_character.GetFullName]已经抵达您的宫廷，随时候命。

original: I shall make [invited_character.GetFirstName] a commander.
translation: 我应该让[invited_character.GetFirstName]成为一名指挥官。

original: [invited_character.GetFirstName] is not what I asked for, begone!
translation: [invited_character.GetFirstName]不是我想要的人，滚蛋！

original: Delayed Random
translation: 延迟随机时间

original: The Mongol Horde will invade at a random date, though at the earliest at the year 1000, and 50 years after the game has started.
translation: 蒙古部落会在随机日期入侵，但最早在公元1000年，以及游戏开始50年后。

original: The Aztec Invasion will occur at a random date, though at the earliest at the year 1000, and 50 years after the game has started.
translation: 阿兹特克入侵将发生在随机日期，但最早在公元 1000 年，并且是游戏开始 50 年后。

original: Rumors of an Immortal
translation: 永生者的流言

original: A scrawled letter arrives
translation: 收到一封字迹潦草的信

original: Word has reached you that there is another Immortal, Ramirez, who is seeking you out. This Spaniard has heard of your Immortality and has vowed to put it to an end. While his motivations are unknown, his intentions appear clear and it is only a matter of time until he finds you.
translation: 你收到消息说，另一个永生者，拉米雷兹，正在寻找你。这个西班牙人听说你永生不朽，发誓要了结你。虽然动机不明，但他意图明确，找到你不过是时间问题。

original: Word of a monstrous man has reached you. This sadistic creature, known as Uran, is also Immortal and has dedicated his long life to inflicting cruelty upon others in the most terrible ways he can imagine. Rumors say his cruelty is only outmatched by his all-consuming jealousy, and hearing of another Immortal has driven him into a frothing rage. If these rumors are to be believed, he is certain track you down and attempt to kill you sooner rather than later...
translation: 你听说了一个怪物般的男人。这个残忍的生物，人称乌兰，也是个永生者，把无限的生命用来以他所能想象的最可怕的方式凌虐他人。有流言说他的残忍是因为内心充满嫉妒，世上还有一个永生者的消息气得他七窍生烟。如果这些流言可信，他肯定会追踪你，并早晚尝试杀死你……

original: Of late you have been hearing tales of another Immortal, Arthur. This man, this paragon of goodness, seems to have devoted his life to helping others and righting wrongs. It seems like a dull life, but everyone needs a hobby you suppose. You have never considered yourself a bad sort, perhaps a little boisterous at times, but Arthur seems to have some kind of grudge against you. Phrases such as 'ending the reign of terror' and 'stopping the unending bloodshed' have been bandied about. It all seems very excessive.
translation: 最近你听说了另一个永生者，亚瑟。这位美德典范般的男人似乎全身心帮助他人并纠正错误。这样的生活似乎很无聊，但你觉得，谁没点爱好呢？你从未觉得自己是个坏人，或许偶尔有些调皮，但亚瑟似乎对你有某种怨恨，提到过「结束恐怖统治」、「停止无穷血腥」这样的词句。这就太过分了。

original: Bards sing of a Shieldmaiden named Torhild, or perhaps she is a Valkyrie walking the earth. Regardless, it is said she is another Immortal and that she thrives on battle. In the most popular ballad she fights her greatest duel against an immortal man named Caine, and after her victory she weeps because she will never again find such a worthy foe. If these tales are true, she may well seek you out and challenge you to a duel.
translation: 诗人吟咏一位叫做托尔希德的盾女——又或者是在凡间行走的女武神的故事。不管怎样，据说她也是永生者，在战场上光耀四方。在最著名的民谣中，她与一位叫凯恩的永生者展开了她最伟大的一场决斗，在取胜之后，她为再也无法找到这样相称的对手而哭泣。如果这些传说是真的，她可能会找到你，并挑起决斗。

original: While the penmanship is atrocious you notice that, curiously, the word-choice indicates a fairly intelligent writer:\n'I do not appreciate imitators, especially in such a blatant display which could draw attention to all of our kind. I am coming for you. You cannot outrun me. I shall burn your city to the ground, it won't be the first I have destroyed. I shall lay waste to your people and trample your legacy into the dirt, as I have done before to greater men. History will view you as a lunatic who destroyed themselves through pride and folly. Await me in terror.'\nThe letter is not signed.
translation: 虽然笔迹粗暴，但你好奇地注意到，信中的遣词造句显示这可能是一位相当聪明的作者：\n「我向来鄙视东施效颦之徒，尤其是招摇过市、引发我族关注者。我将追逐觅踪，你必无路可逃。我将把你的城市烧成白地，它并非第一座；我会屠灭你的领民、践踏你的遗产，此前更强大的人也未能幸免。历史将如此记述你：骄傲愚蠢，自寻死路的的疯子。在战栗中等待我吧。」\n信上没有签名。

original: Bring them on!
translation: 让他们来吧！

original: I don't like the sound of this!
translation: 我讨厌听到这个！

original: It's not as if I flay people. Often.
translation: 我不剥人的皮。通常。

original: Your Rival has found you!
translation: 你的对手找到了你！

original: As you step out your rooms you barely have time to wonder where your guards are before you are confronted by [immortal_rival.GetFirstName]\n'Your life ends now!' he shouts, raising his sword.
translation: 当你走出房间，尚未开始疑惑你的守卫们都去了哪里便迎面碰见了[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]。\n「你命绝今日！」他大喝一声，举起了剑。

original: As you step out your rooms you barely have time to wonder where your guards are before you are confronted by [immortal_rival.GetFirstName]\n 'Time to die, you [GetFromRootInsult]!' he growls, hefting his sword.
translation: 当你走出房间，尚未开始疑惑你的守卫们都去了哪里便迎面碰见了[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]。\n「你死期到了，[GetFromRootInsult]！」他高举长剑咆哮着。

original: As you step out your rooms notice the odd absence of your guards for a moment before [immortal_rival.GetFirstName] steps out in front of you.\n'It is time to bring an end to you,' he says, somewhat sadly, 'make your peace with your god.'
translation: 你走出房间，发现你的守卫神秘消失了，随即便发现[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]慢步走到你的面前。\n「你的生命将在此终结。」他说道，带着几分伤感，「愿你与你的神一同安息。」

original: The hallway is deserted of everyone except an armored women you suspect is [immortal_rival.GetFirstName]. Your suspicions are confirmed when she introduces herself and challenges you to a duel.
translation: 门厅中的众人皆四散离去，只剩下一个全副武装的女人，你觉得那大概是[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]。她的自我介绍证实了你的猜想，随后向你提出决斗。

original: The corridor is splatted with blood and the bodies of your guards lie broken and trampled everywhere you look. A massive horse stands in the midst of the slaughter, steam rising from his flanks. You notice the mangled body of [immortal_horse_victim.GetBestName] by his hooves.'I am Incitatus, trampler of nations!' he announces 'I brook no imitations. You're next.'
translation: 走廊中洒满了鲜血，目之所及皆是你的守卫们残破的尸体。一匹高头大马矗立在这片修罗场的中央，两肋升腾着蒸汽。你注意到他的蹄下踩着[immortal_horse_victim.GetBestName]破布般的尸体。「我乃因西塔图斯，万国的践踏者！」他大声宣告，「我绝不容忍赝品，接下来到你了。」

original: The corridor is splatted with blood and the bodies of your guards lie broken and trampled everywhere you look. A massive horse stands in the midst of the slaughter, steam rising from his flanks. You notice the mangled body of [immortal_horse_victim.GetBestName] by his hooves.'I am Incitatus, trampler of nations!' he announces 'I herd you had put a horse on your council, but it seems I was misinformed. Nonetheless, you're next.'
translation: 走廊中洒满了鲜血，目之所及皆是你的守卫们残破的尸体。一匹高头大马矗立在这片修罗场的中央，两肋升腾着蒸汽。你注意到他的蹄下踩着[immortal_horse_victim.GetBestName]破布般的尸体。「我乃因西塔图斯，万国的践踏者！」他大声宣告，「我听闻你将一匹马接纳进内阁，但这看来不过是误传。不过，接下来到你了。」

original: Without hesitation you tear your sword from its sheath and leap to the attack. [immortal_rival.GetFirstName] seems startled by the ferocity of your onslaught and is barely able to parry your first few blows. You feign a small overextension of your thrust and [immortal_rival.GetSheHe] takes the bait: As [immortal_rival.GetSheHe] attempts a counter-attack your blade snaps down and takes [immortal_rival.GetHerHis] hand clean off at the wrist. Before [immortal_rival.GetSheHe] can do more than gasp at the sudden pain your sword whips up and around, slicing [immortal_rival.GetHerHis] head from [immortal_rival.GetHerHis] shoulders.
translation: 你毫不犹豫地拔剑跳劈。[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]似乎被你猛击的冲力吓到，勉强招架住这一击。你假装用力过猛而[immortal_rival.GetSheHe]果然上当：当[immortal_rival.GetSheHe]试图反击你时，你的利刃瞬间下砍并齐腕夺走了[immortal_rival.GetHerHis]手。[immortal_rival.GetSheHe]还仅仅来得及为这突然的剧痛倒吸一口凉气，你的长剑如鸟翼般舒展转向，从[immortal_rival.GetHerHis]双肩上切下[immortal_rival.GetHerHis]大好头颅。

original: All too easy, [immortal_rival.GetFirstName]!
translation: 不费吹灰之力，[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]！

original: Overcoming your brief surprize, you snatch a dagger from your belt and launch yourself at [immortal_rival.GetFirstName]! [immortal_rival.GetSheHe] appears to be startled by the speed of your assault, but manages a hasty block and counter-attack. However, they are completely unprepared for you catching [immortal_rival.GetHerHis] blade in your free hand and plunging your dagger into [immortal_rival.GetHerHis] wide-open eye.
translation: 压下你短暂的惊讶，你从腰间掏出一把匕首便冲向了[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]！[immortal_rival.GetSheHe]被你突击的速度吓了一跳，但还是匆忙地完成了格挡并予以还击。然而，他们完全没有料到你用空着的手抓住了[immortal_rival.GetHerHis]利刃并把匕首插进了[immortal_rival.GetHerHis]大大睁开的眼中。

original: Another victory, another scar.
translation: 又一次胜利，又一道伤疤。

original: As [immortal_rival.GetFirstName] rushes towards you with [immortal_rival.GetHerHis] sword held high. You barely have time to draw your own dagger and launch a desperate thrust as [immortal_rival.GetSheHe] it swings down at you. Your knife pierces [immortal_rival.GetHerHis] heart at the same time as [immortal_rival.GetHerHis] blade cuts into your flesh.
translation: 随着[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]冲了过来并高举[immortal_rival.GetHerHis]长剑。你几乎没有时间拔出匕首，只能在最后一秒刺出，因为[immortal_rival.GetSheHe]已挥剑砍向你。你的小刀穿透了[immortal_rival.GetHerHis]心脏，而同时[immortal_rival.GetHerHis]利刃也切开了你的血肉。

original: Urgh... Still alive. Still alive!
translation: 呃……还活着。我还活着！

original: You fumble for your sword as [immortal_rival.GetFirstName] charges at you, blade hissing towards your face. Somehow you manage to parry [immortal_rival.GetHerHis] first blow, and then [immortal_rival.GetHerHis] second, but you know you are out-matched. Desperately you launch a flurry of blows, but all of a sudden there is a flash of steel coming at you and your vision begins to spin.
translation: 你匆忙摸索到你的长剑，而[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]正向你冲来，利刃嘶嘶作响攻向你的脸部。你想办法成功招架住了[immortal_rival.GetHerHis]第一击，然后挡住[immortal_rival.GetHerHis]第二击，但你知道自己不是对手。你绝望地发动一连串攻击，但突然一道金属的闪光射来，你的视线有些恍惚。

original: With a sudden jolt your vision clears. For a moment, before darkness closes over you, you are puzzled to see [immortal_rival.GetFirstName] standing over a headless body. You briefly wonder where it came from.
translation: 突然一阵晃荡，你的视线开始清晰。在被黑暗吞噬之前，有那么一瞬，你满心疑惑地看到[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]站在一具无头尸体前。你短暂地想了一会这尸体从何而来。

original: Sea Queen
translation: 海盗女王

original: This character is known and feared far and wide. Wherever salt water can be found, there is terror of the Sea Queen.
translation: 这名角色的恐怖声名连遥远之地也都知晓。凡可见咸水之处，皆有对海盗女王的恐惧。

original: A shame about [From.GetBestName], but at least I have a snack!
translation: [From.GetBestName]令人遗憾，但至少我还有点心吃！

original: [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] be praised!
translation: 赞美[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]！

original: Skylord
translation: 天之骄子

original: The epitome of a Steppe Warrior, this character has fought for the glory of Tengrism.
translation: 作为草原战士的典范，这个角色为长生天的荣耀而战。

original: Hound of Dievas
translation: 季耶瓦斯猎犬

original: This character has fought to defend the Holy Forest.
translation: 这个角色为保卫圣林而战。

original: Ukko's Hammer
translation: 乌戈之锤

original: Striking like the lightning of Ukko, this character has fought for the Suomenusko faith.
translation: 动如乌戈之雷霆，这个角色为索米信仰而战。

original: Eagle Knight
translation: 雄鹰战士

original: The life of Aztec warriors is one of constant battle, and the Eagle Knights are the bravest and most fearsome. Their primary purpose is to capture prisoners to be sacrificed to their Gods.
translation: 阿兹特克战士一生不断征战，雄鹰战士则是其中最为勇猛可畏的。他们的主要任务是捕获俘虏向众神献祭。

original: Perun's Chosen
translation: 佩龙选民

original: The axes of Perun's Chosen hew the enemies of the Slavic faith with the power of His lightning.
translation: 选民们的斧头以佩龙闪电的力量劈砍斯拉夫信仰的敌人。

original: Nyame's Shield
translation: 尼亚姆之盾

original: This character is one of the chosen warriors who fight for the African faith.
translation: 这个角色被选中为非洲信仰而战的战士。

original: Warrior of the Sun
translation: 太阳武士

original: The Warriors of the Sun strike with all the fiery power of Zun Himself.
translation: 太阳武士以尊日神的全部灼热力量攻击。

original: Ares' Own
translation: 阿瑞斯之属

original: Ares' Own are overwhelming, insatiable in battle, destructive, and man-slaughtering. They fight for the Hellenic faith.
translation: 阿瑞斯之属无人能当，从不厌倦战斗、毁灭和屠杀。他们为希腊信仰而战。

original: Our Religious Head was sacrificed to Heathen Gods.
translation: 我们的宗教领袖被献祭给异教神灵。

original: We sacrificed the Head of a false Religion!
translation: 我们献祭了一位异教领袖！

original: All the power of your Church cannot save you, [From.GetBestName]!
translation: 你的教会用尽全力也无法救你，[From.GetBestName]！

original: There shall be no peace upon you, [From.GetBestName]!
translation: 你不会得到安息，[From.GetBestName]！

original: Their family will be rather upset.
translation: 他们的家族会非常失望。

original: The Court is shocked!
translation: 宫廷大为震惊！

original: Cannibal
translation: 食人者

original: This character seeks to serve man.
translation: 这个角色寻求把人放上餐桌。

original: was horribly killed by platypuses
translation: 被鸭嘴兽残忍杀害

original: was horribly killed by the platypuses of $KILLER$
translation: 被$KILLER$的鸭嘴兽残忍地杀害

original: Perpetual Motion Machine
translation: 永动机

original: A trapped Immortal is consigned to run within a wheel here for all eternity. A system of pulleys and gears attached to the wheel run various sawmills, grindstones, and other useful machinery.
translation: 一个被困的永生者只能在此处的一个转轮中永恒地跑动。连接到转轮上的滑轮和齿轮系统可以使得锯木厂、石磨和其他有用的机械工作。

original: As the red mist begins to overcome you, you are conscious of grabbing a battleaxe from the wall and swinging it at [immortal_rival.GetFirstName] with a bestial scream of pure fury...\nWhen you come back to yourself you are coated head-to-toe in blood, [immortal_rival.GetFirstName]'s body is in numerous small pieces, and the hallway is in thorough need of a cleaning. You brush some entrails from your shoulder and continue about your business.
translation: 红色的薄雾开始慢慢淹没你，你意识到自己从墙上抓下一把战斧，饱含着纯粹的狂怒，如野兽般嘶吼着向[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]挥去……\n当你恢复意识时，你从头到脚浸满了鲜血，[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]碎了一地，门厅需要做一次彻底的清扫。你从肩上拂落几块内脏，便回头继续去做你的事了。

original: I wonder who that was?
translation: 我想知道那是谁？

original: GRRRRRAAARGH!
translation: 呃啊啊啊啊啊啊！

original: Huh, picked up a scratch.
translation: 嚯，划伤了。

original: As [immortal_rival.GetFirstName] rushes towards you, you let out a high-pitched scream and throw yourself to the floor. This seems to take [immortal_rival.GetHerHim] by surprize as [immortal_rival.GetSheHe] trips over your sprawled form. You leap to your feet and are about to flee the scene when you realize [immortal_rival.GetFirstName] is not getting up again, [immortal_rival.GetSheHe] somehow landed on [immortal_rival.GetHerHis] own sword.
translation: 看到[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]冲向你，你发出一声高亢的尖叫直接趴倒在地上。这举动完全出乎[immortal_rival.GetHerHim]的意料，[immortal_rival.GetSheHe]被五体投地的你跘倒了。你跌跌撞撞地爬起来正要离开现场，却发现[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]没有再起身。[immortal_rival.GetSheHe]不知怎地摔在[immortal_rival.GetHerHis]长剑上。

original: That was lucky!
translation: 真是好运！

original: Oh [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I'm dying!
translation: 哦[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]，我要死了！

original: Not today, [immortal_rival.GetFirstName]!
translation: 他日再会，[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]！

original: Thinking quickly you step backwards into your chambers and press the concealed button in the door frame. The hidden trapdoor outside opens under [immortal_rival.GetFirstName]'s feet as [immortal_rival.GetHerHis] charge carries [immortal_rival.GetHerHim] towards you, turning [immortal_rival.GetHerHis] scream of anger into a squeal of surprize. While you are not sure if the spikes at the bottom can kill an Immortal, your are sure they will ruin [immortal_rival.GetHerHis] day.
translation: 你迅速想出对策，退回你的房间并按下门框上隐藏着的按钮。房间外暗藏着的陷阱门就在[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]的脚下打开，而[immortal_rival.GetHerHis]冲刺正带着[immortal_rival.GetHerHim]走到一半，把[immortal_rival.GetHerHis]怒吼变成了惊声尖叫。你不知道坑底的矛尖能否杀死一名不朽者，但你确信[immortal_rival.GetHerHis]今天不好过。

original: Fill the pit with rocks, it's the only way to be sure.
translation: 把坑里填满石头，这是唯一妥当的办法。

original: Perhaps we can put [immortal_rival.GetFirstName] to good use...
translation: 或许我们能够好好利用[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]……

original: As [immortal_rival.GetFirstName] makes some kind of threatening speech, you reflect that it was for exactly this kind of situation that you had concealed guard posts built throughout your home. You discreetly pull the silent-alarm rope and several squads of soldiers rush from their secret posts to swarm [immortal_rival.GetFirstName]. Although [immortal_rival.GetSheHe] seems to put up a good fight, they are no match for your well-equipped guards and are soon subdued.\n 'An excellent investment!' you think to yourself.
translation: 当[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]开始说出威胁你的话语时，你意识到你在自家各处建设隐蔽岗哨的目的就是为了应对这种状况。你小心拉下无声警报绳，数队士兵从隐蔽岗哨中向[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]一拥而上。尽管[immortal_rival.GetSheHe]战力超绝，但并不是你装备精良的卫兵们的对手，迅速遭到了压制。\n「绝佳的投资！」你暗想。

original: Take [immortal_rival.GetHerHim] to the cells.
translation: 把[immortal_rival.GetHerHim]关到牢房里。

original: Take [immortal_rival.GetHerHim] outside and burn [immortal_rival.GetHerHim].
translation: 把[immortal_rival.GetHerHim]带出去，烧死[immortal_rival.GetHerHim]。

original: Time to feed my special pets...
translation: 该喂一下我特别的宠物了……

original: Wait! Let's talk about this!
translation: 等等！我们谈一谈！

original: Using all of your natural charm and wit you are able to engage [immortal_rival.GetFirstName] in conversation before [immortal_rival.GetSheHe] can attack. You quickly find common ground and form a strong rapport with [immortal_rival.GetFirstName], soon you are chatting away like old friends. After what seems like minutes you realize you have been talking for hours, and [immortal_rival.GetFirstName] reflects that [immortal_rival.GetSheHe] cannot believe they came here to kill you.\n 'I was so foolish,' [immortal_rival.GetSheHe] says, 'violence is never the answer!'
translation: 在[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]攻击你之前，你用尽你的天生魅力与幽默与[immortal_rival.GetSheHe]聊天。你很快找到与[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]的共同点，建立了牢固的关系，就像老友相逢一样融洽。感觉只有几分钟之久，但其实你已经与[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]聊了几个小时，[immortal_rival.GetSheHe]都忘了他来这里是为了杀你。\n「我真蠢，」[immortal_rival.GetSheHe]说，「暴力不可取！」

original: I keep my fiends close
translation: 我和朋友们总是这么亲密

original: but my enemies CLOSER!
translation: 但是我的敌人们离我更近！

original: Engage them in scholarly debate
translation: 与他们进行学术辩论

original: You call out a number of theorems about the nature of mortality which sound high-minded but have some obvious flaws if given more than a cursory thought. [immortal_rival.GetFirstName] is clearly torn by their desire to kill you and begone, but [immortal_rival.GetSheHe] clearly cannot resist the urge to point out the errors in your logic. Exasperated, [immortal_rival.GetSheHe] begins an exhaustive refutation of your points, one by one.
translation: 你提出许多有关人类必死本质的定理，它们听起来都是高端智慧，但只要略加思索便会发现许多明显的破绽。[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]很显然迫不及待地想要赶紧杀掉你然后走人，但是[immortal_rival.GetSheHe]明显无法忍耐想要指出你逻辑中的错误。暴跳如雷的[immortal_rival.GetSheHe]开始一条一条详尽地反驳起你的论点。

original: Raise new arguments
translation: 开启新的争论

original: Refuse to acknowledge your errors
translation: 拒不承认错误

original: [immortal_rival.GetFirstName] is clearly getting highly invested in your debate. Your deliberate errors in your opening arguments have convinced [immortal_rival.GetHerHim] that [immortal_rival.GetSheHe] has the upper hand. Finding broad gestures are not enough to emphasize their points they sheath their sword, pull out some chalk, and begin to scrawl notes and graphs on the wall of the corridor.
translation: [immortal_rival.GetFirstName]全身心投入辩论。你故意犯下的错误让[immortal_rival.GetHerHim]以为[immortal_rival.GetSheHe]占据上风。发现光是肢体语言已经无法强调他们的观点，他们长剑入鞘，掏出几根粉笔，开始在走廊的墙上画出说明与图表。

original: Spring a logical trap
translation: 触发逻辑陷阱

original: While they are distracted, smash their head with a candlestick.
translation: 趁他们分心，用烛台打他们的头。

original: [immortal_rival.GetFirstName] has taken the bait and is vigorously arguing against what [immortal_rival.GetSheHe] believes to be your latest nonsensical point.\n'So you see,' they conclude angrily, 'immortals cannot possibly exist!'\nThere is a brief pause wherein you think you start to see a look of startled realization begin to form on [immortal_rival.GetFirstName]'s face, but before it can fully take shape there is a clap of displaced air and [immortal_rival.GetFirstName] vanishes from existence.
translation: [immortal_rival.GetFirstName]上钩了，开始精力旺盛地同你争辩[immortal_rival.GetSheHe]对于你最后那条荒谬论点的看法。\n「所以说，」他们愤怒地作出结语，「不死者根本不可能存在！」\n争论中断的一瞬间，你认为你看到震惊的表情开始出现在[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]的脸上，但在表情成型之前，空气啪地一声合拢而[immortal_rival.GetFirstName]则消失得无影无踪。

original: I think, therefore I am.
translation: 我思故我在。

original: Fight!
translation: 战斗！

original: Die
translation: 死亡

original: Rage...taking...control!
translation: 愤怒……掌控！

original: Perhaps a change of clothes is needed though.
translation: 或许是应该换身衣服。

original: You give up.
translation: 你放弃了。

original: [immortal_rival.GetFirstName] is disgusted by your cowardice and leaves.
translation: [immortal_rival.GetFirstName]对你的怯懦感到厌恶，于是转身离去了。

original: Immortal Loyalty
translation: 因永生而忠诚

original: This character is devoted to their Immortal Liege and hopes to one day learn their secret.
translation: 这个角色忠于他们永生的领主，希望某天能获知永生的秘密。

original: Immortal suspicions
translation: 因永生而怀疑

original: This character is deeply suspicions of their possibly Immortal Liege.
translation: 这个角色深深猜疑他们可能永生的领主。

original: Immortal disgust
translation: 因永生而厌恶

original: This character is disgusted by the unnatural Immortality of their Liege.
translation: 这个角色厌恶领主那非自然的永生。

original: Some of my vassals are beginning to suspect my reign has lasted too long. While they are not yet fully convinced of my Immortality, they are suspicious and will likely make trouble if they remain in power.
translation: 我的一些封臣开始怀疑我统治太长了。他们还不确信我是永生者，但充满怀疑，而且他们只要还掌握权力就有可能制造麻烦。

original: The suspicious vassals are now certain there is something unnatural about me, and are certainly plotting my demise. They must be stamped out, root and branch.
translation: 这些怀疑中的封臣现在确信我有非自然的力量，并显然正在谋划我的死亡。他们必须被连根拔除。

original: Blessed People
translation: 受祝福的民众

original: Ask Permission for Faith Focus
translation: 请求允许信仰重心

original: Send a letter to §Y[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]§! asking for permission to change the childhood focus of §Y[Root.GetFirstName]§!. Focusing on faith will make §Y[Root.GetFirstName]§! adopt your religion.
translation: 给§Y[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]§!寄出一封信征求许可以更改§Y[Root.GetFirstName]§!的童年焦点。以信仰作为焦点将使得§Y[Root.GetFirstName]§!改信你的宗教。

original: Change Childhood Focus to Faith
translation: 变更童年焦点为信仰

original: Change the focus of §Y[Root.GetFirstName]§!. Focusing on faith will make §Y[Root.GetFirstName]§! adopt your religion.
translation: 改变§Y[Root.GetFirstName]§!的重心。以信仰作为重心将使得§Y[Root.GetFirstName]§!改信你的宗教。

original:
To the [GetFromFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledNameWithNick],

I write to ask for your permission to give my ward, [From.GetFirstName], a proper [FromFrom.Religion.GetName] upbringing and learn the ways of [FromFrom.Religion.GetScriptureName].

Signed [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName].
translation:
致[GetFromFromRootCompliment][Root.GetTitledNameWithNick]，

我向你写这封信以征求你的许可，去给予我的受监护人，[From.GetFirstName]，以适当的[FromFrom.Religion.GetName]抚养环境并学习[FromFrom.Religion.GetScriptureName]的生活方式。

此致，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: Dear [Root.GetTitledNameWithNick],\n\nYour initiative to teach [FromFrom.GetFirstName] about your religion is most welcome and I accept your proposal.
translation: 亲爱的[Root.GetTitledNameWithNick]，\n\n你主动提出教导[FromFrom.GetFirstName]有关你的宗教的内容，我表示最大程度的欢迎，同意你的请求。

original: To the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\n\nI am certain you can understand what a blasphemous suggestion you are making! [FromFrom.GetFirstName] is supposed to grow up to be a fine and dutiful [FromFrom.GetManWoman], something which will obviously not be possible with your strange rituals and profane manners.
translation: 致[GetFromRootInsult][Root.GetTitledFirstName]，\n\n我相信你知道这是何等亵渎的言辞！[FromFrom.GetFirstName]应当成长为一名优秀尽职的[FromFrom.GetManWoman]，但你那些奇怪的仪式和渎神的行为明显会让我的期盼落空。

original: Vassal Limit
translation: 封臣上限

original: The Vassal Limit and number of vassals a ruler can control without penalties is at the default level.
translation: 统治者的封臣上限以及无惩罚时能控制的封臣数量为默认水平。

original: The Vassal Limit is reduced to half the default level.
translation: 封臣上限降到默认水平的一半。

original: The Vassal Limit is reduced to a fourth of the default level.
translation: 封臣上限降到默认水平的四分之一。

original: There is no limit to the number of vassals a ruler can control.
translation: 统治者现在没有可控制封臣数量的上限。

original: Grant Independence
translation: 准许独立

original: The Grant Independence action is restricted.
translation: 准许独立这一行为受到限制，你不能准许法理领土内的同宗教封臣独立。

original: The Grant Independence action is unrestricted and can be used to grant independence to anyone.
translation: 准许独立这一行为没有限制，可以无限制地准许任何人独立。

original: Landed characters can not inherit
translation: 已经拥有封地的角色无法继承。

original: Demesne Size
translation: 直辖领大小

original: The Demesne Size and amount of land a ruler can control is at the default level.
translation: 统治者的直辖领大小和可管理的土地数量为默认水平。

original: Half
translation: 一半

original: The Demesne Size is reduced to a half the default level.
translation: 直辖领大小缩减到默认水平的一半。

original: Quartered
translation: 四分之一

original: The Demesne Size is reduced to a fourth of the default level.
translation: 直辖领大小缩减到默认水平的四分之一。

original: Unlimited
translation: 没有限制

original: There is no limit to the amount of land a ruler can control.
translation: 统治者可管理的土地数量没有限制。

original: Turkic Conquerors
translation: 突厥征服者

original: The great Central Asian Turkic conquerors Sabuktigin, Seljuk and Timur will tend to rise in their historical timeframes.
translation: 伟大的中亚突厥征服者苏布克特勤、塞尔柱和帖木儿将倾向于按照其历史时间范围崛起。

original: Sabuktigin, Seljuk and Timur can appear in a wider time span.
translation: 苏布克特勤、塞尔柱和帖木儿将出现在更宽泛的时间范围中。

original: The great Turkic conquerors will never rise.
translation: 伟大的突厥征服者们将不会崛起。

original: Titles Named After Dynasties
translation: 头衔按照家族命名

original: Many cultures name their titles after the ruling dynasty (e.g. Abbasids, Bavandids, etc.)
translation: 许多文化按照其统治家族来命名头衔（比如阿拔斯，巴文德等等。）

original: The base name is always used for titles, regardless of the ruler's culture.
translation: 头衔总是使用其基本名称，无视统治者文化的设定。

original: Cultural Title Names
translation: 文化头衔名称

original: The names of titles may change depending on the ruling culture (e.g. 'Sviþjod' instead of Sweden.)
translation: 头衔名称可能会根据统治者的文化改变（比如「斯威亚里格」代替瑞典）。

original: The English name is used for all titles regardless of the ruling culture.
translation: 所有头衔都使用其英文名称，无视统治文化。

original: Cheery
translation: 愉悦

original: This character had a great time, resulting in a cheery disposition enjoyed by everyone.
translation: 这个角色度过了愉快的时光，开心的情绪感染了每一个人。

original: I saw my mortal enemy [feast_duel_target.GetTitledFirstName] as soon as I stepped into [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]'s castle. [feast_duel_target.GetHerHisCap] presence was almost more than I could bear and I longed to pick up my sword and impale [feast_duel_target.GetHerHim] with it!
translation: 我一进入[Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的城堡，就看到了我的死敌[feast_duel_target.GetTitledFirstName]。[feast_duel_target.GetHerHisCap]存在让我几乎无法忍受，我现在真想拔出剑把[feast_duel_target.GetHerHim]扎个窟窿！

original: [feast_duel_target.GetTitledFirstName] is challenged to a duel by [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: [feast_duel_target.GetTitledFirstName]收到了[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的决斗挑战

original: 'How dare you spoil my feast with your silly quarrel?!'\n\nI managed to stop the duel before anyone was killed but I could tell [From.GetTitledFirstName] did not really listen to me, [From.GetSheHe] looked as eager as ever to settle the scores with [From.GetHerHis] 'mortal enemy' [feast_duel_target.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 「你怎么敢让你愚蠢的矛盾毁掉我的宴会？！」\n\n我成功在任何人被杀死之前阻止了决斗，但我知道[From.GetTitledFirstName]根本没有把我的话听进去，[From.GetSheHe]看起来还是很想与[From.GetHerHis]「死敌」[feast_duel_target.GetTitledFirstName]算账。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] managed to kill [From.GetHerHis] opponent [feast_duel_target.GetTitledFirstName] before I managed to stop the duel.
translation: 在我来得及阻止决斗之前，[From.GetTitledFirstName]已经杀死了[From.GetHerHis]敌人[feast_duel_target.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: The duel was over when I reached them, [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s opponent, [feast_duel_target.GetTitledFirstName], lay wounded at [From.GetHerHis] feet.
translation: 我赶到他们那里的时候决斗已经结束了，[From.GetTitledFirstName]的敌人，[feast_duel_target.GetTitledFirstName]，负伤躺在[From.GetHerHis]身下的地上。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s maimed opponent, [feast_duel_target.GetTitledFirstName], tried to stand up when I reached them, but collapsed once again at [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s feet.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]的残废敌人，[feast_duel_target.GetTitledFirstName]，在我赶到他们那里时努力想要站起来，但只能又一次瘫倒在[From.GetTitledFirstName]的脚下。

original: Don't just stand there, help [feast_duel_target.GetHerHim]!
translation: 别傻站着，帮帮[feast_duel_target.GetHerHim]！

original: [feast_duel_target.GetTitledFirstName] surely deserved it
translation: [feast_duel_target.GetTitledFirstName]活该如此

original: Betrayed Me
translation: 背叛了我

original: Congratulations on your marriage! While Alfonso is busy trying to get [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] with child, you might want to select a new, family oriented Ambition.
translation: 恭喜新婚！当阿方索正忙着和[Root.Spouse.GetFirstName]造人，你也许想要选择一个新的、家庭导向的野心。

original: As your father's heir, it falls on you to take him to the mountains. He will be offered to the birds of prey and in death he will generously share his flesh with all living creatures. May his spirit soar into the heavens.
translation: 作为你父亲的继承人，你要负责将他带进群山之中。他将成为鸟儿们的食物，在死后慷慨地与所有生灵分享自己的血肉。愿他的灵魂升入天堂。

original: Without any heirs of his own, it falls on you to take your brother to the mountains. He will be offered to the birds of prey and in death he will generously share his flesh with all living creatures. May his spirit soar into the heavens.
translation: 因为你的兄弟没有任何继承人，你要负责将他带进群山之中。他将成为鸟儿们的食物，在死后慷慨地与所有生灵分享自己的血肉。愿他的灵魂升入天堂。

original: As per custom, you should take your predecessor to the mountains. They will be offered to the birds of prey and in death they will generously share their flesh with all living creatures. May their spirit soar into the heavens.
translation: 按照惯例，你应该将你的前任带进群山之中。他们将成为鸟儿们的食物，在死后慷慨地与所有生灵分享自己的血肉。愿他们的灵魂升入天堂。

original: As your mother's heir it falls upon you to bring her to the mountains. She will be offered to the birds of prey, and in death she will generously share her flesh with all living creatures. May her spirit soar into the heavens.
translation: 作为你母亲的继承人，你要负责将她带进群山之中。她将成为鸟儿们的食物，在死后慷慨地与所有生灵分享自己的血肉。愿她的灵魂升入天堂。

original: Without any heirs of her own, it falls upon you to bring your sister to the mountains. She will be offered to the birds of prey, and in death she will generously share her flesh with all living creatures. May her spirit soar into the heavens.
translation: 因为你的姐妹没有自己的继承人，你要负责将她带进群山之中。她将成为鸟儿们的食物，在死后慷慨地与所有生灵分享自己的血肉。愿她的灵魂升入天堂。

original: During a mission to try and fabricate a claim to a title in [From.Location.GetName], my [Root.GetChancellorName] has been murdered!
translation: 我的[Root.GetChancellorName]在[From.Location.GetName]执行伪造头衔宣称的任务时被谋杀了！

original: The liege of §Y[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName]§! will decide how to deal with [target_spy_on.GetHerHim].\n
translation: §Y[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName]§!的领主将决定怎样处置[target_spy_on.GetHerHim]。\n

original: §Y[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName]§! will either stay out of factions or be exposed, giving you the right to imprison [target_spy_on.GetHerHim].\n
translation: §Y[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName]§!必须离开派系，否则此事将被揭发，这将使你有权逮捕[target_spy_on.GetHerHim]。\n

original: §Y[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName]§! will either join your factions or be exposed, giving you the right to imprison [target_spy_on.GetHerHim].\n
translation: §Y[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName]§!必须加入你的派系，否则此事将被揭发，这将使你有权逮捕[target_spy_on.GetHerHim]。\n

original: Do not use the information, but keep spying on §Y[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 不利用此信息，但继续监视§Y[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName]§!。\n

original: Do not use the information and stop spying on §Y[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 不利用此信息并停止监视§Y[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName]§!。\n

original: Do not use the information against §Y[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 不利用此信息对付§Y[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName]§!。\n

original: Will Not Marry
translation: 不会结婚

original: For one reason or another, this character will not get married.
translation: 因为某些原因。此角色将不会结婚。

original: Some nights you are beset by terrible nightmares in which you witness the death of your trusted steed, [From.GetBestName]. How will you be able to live without [From.GetHerHim]?
translation: 噩梦困扰了你好几个晚上，在梦里你亲眼见到爱马[From.GetBestName]死去。没有了[From.GetHerHim]你可怎么活啊？

original: I shall offer [From.GetFirstName] my magical blood!
translation: 我将赠予[From.GetFirstName]我充满魔力的鲜血！

original: Immortality is my gift, and my gift alone!
translation: 不朽是上天给我的恩赐，我便是世间唯一的永生者！

original: Given Council Position
translation: 授予内阁职位

original: Given Council Position
translation: 授予内阁职位

original: Given Council Position
translation: 授予内阁职位

original: This character's choice of councillor has been the cause of some dismay.
translation: 这个角色挑选出的内阁成员是惊愕与恐慌的原因。

original: This character's choice of councillor has been the cause of some dismay.
translation: 这个角色挑选出的内阁成员是惊愕与恐慌的原因。

original: This character's choice of councillor has been the cause of some dismay.
translation: 这个角色挑选出的内阁成员是惊愕与恐慌的原因。

original: Distressing Encounter
translation: 令人忧心的会面

original: Commit Suicide
translation: 自杀

original: At first the prospect of eternal life seemed to be the sweetest dream imaginable. In hindsight, eternity is a very, very long time.
translation: 一开始，永生的未来似乎是最甜美的梦想。事后方知，永恒是非常、非常长的一段时间。

original: Has not attempted to commit suicide recently.
translation: 最近没有尝试过自杀

original: Eternal life brings nothing but heartbreak and sorrow. While everything and everyone around you ages and withers away, you remain unchanged. Each dreary day blurs into the next. You have decided to end your life… if you can.
translation: 永生只能带来心碎与悲伤。斯人已逝，沧海桑田。然而唯独你苟活于世。每一天都是枯燥无味的。你决定结束这一切……如果你能的话。

original: You tried. You really, really did, but the endless, dreary days and even longer, empty nights have gotten the better of you. With no one to call your love, no friends to brighten your days and no children bringing dreams of a better tomorrow… life is not really worth living anymore.
translation: 你倦了，真的倦了。然而你仍然得面对索然无味的明天，空虚的夜笼罩着你。周围却没有爱人与你同床共枕，没有朋友与你推心置腹，没有儿女与你共享天伦……生活已经没有意义了。

original: You tried. You really, really did, but dark thoughts creep uninvited into your mind none the less. You know that you are not alone, although it sure feels that way. Being surrounded by people who do not see, cannot understand… some days that is worse than total isolation.
translation: 你倦了，真的倦了。但是来自意识深处的邪恶思想仍然在恣意地潜入你地思绪。你知道你不是孤身一人，却仍然感到孤独。被无法理解你的人环绕，有些时候这比孤独还可怕。

original: I will meet my end in a duel to the death.
translation: 我决定在决斗场上结束我的一生。

original: You challenge your rival §Y[suicide_duel_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! to a duel.
translation: 你一场决斗中挑战你的仇敌§Y[suicide_duel_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!。

original: Poison will gift me sweet oblivion.
translation: 饮毒自尽是最美好的解脱。

original: I will have a quick and painless death by the noose.
translation: 希望绞索能给我一个快速无痛的死亡。

original: The highest balcony in the keep offers one last view of my realm.
translation: 城堡最高处的阳台至少能让我在最后的时刻再看一眼我的领地。

original:
To the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetBestName],
You have tainted this world with your presence for too long. I challenge you to a duel. In a month's time, bring your sword and meet me in [From.Location.GetName], or forfeit your honor. Only one of us will return alive.

Signed, [From.GetBestName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootInsult][Root.GetBestName]，
你的存在污染这个的世界太久了，一个月之内我将与你在[From.Location.GetName]进行一场光明正大的决斗。要么带上你的剑，要么像一个没有荣誉可言的懦夫逃走。我们之中只有一个人能活着离开。

此致，[From.GetBestName]

original: I will have that [GetFromRootInsult]'s head!
translation: 我要取那[GetFromRootInsult]的项上人头！

original: No, that sounds dangerous...
translation: 不，这太危险了……

original:
To the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetBestName],
I will gladly rid this world of your foul presence. Get your affairs in order, for I will show you no mercy.

Signed, [From.GetBestName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootInsult][Root.GetBestName]，
我很愿意将你这个肮脏下流的脓包从这个世界上清除。快去办好后事吧，我不会手下留情的。

此致，[From.GetBestName]

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] is playing right into my hands.
translation: 我正将[From.GetSheHeCap]玩弄在鼓掌之中。

original:
To the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetBestName],
I neither have the time nor desire to indulge you in your petty pastimes. Have you no better to do, such as running your realm, for one? 

Signed, [From.GetBestName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootInsult][Root.GetBestName]，
我既没时间也不想迁就你去沉浸在你可悲的过去时光中。难道你就没有类似于管理领地之类的正事可干吗？

此致，[From.GetBestName]

original: That blasted coward...
translation: 那个可恶的胆小鬼……

original: Your plans to end your life have been foiled. Perhaps you will make another attempt, in time...\n
translation: 你自尽的企图失败了，但你没准还会在合适的时机再次尝试自杀……\n

original: [suicide_duel_target.GetTitledFirstName] was easy enough to fool. [suicide_duel_target.GetSheHeCap] was so thirsty for your blood that [suicide_duel_target.GetSheHe] did not notice the feebleness of your attempts to defend yourself. It was only a moment before [suicide_duel_target.GetHerHis] blade found the hollow of your throat.
translation: [suicide_duel_target.GetTitledFirstName]真好骗。[suicide_duel_target.GetSheHeCap]太过渴求你的鲜血，[suicide_duel_target.GetSheHe]都没注意到你故意软弱无力地防御自己。没几下[suicide_duel_target.GetHerHis]利刃就找到了你的喉下凹陷。

original: That useless [suicide_duel_target.GetManWoman] is good for absolutely nothing! Despite your attempts to give [suicide_duel_target.GetHerHim] every possible opening [suicide_duel_target.GetTitledFirstName] only managed to give you a few scratches.
translation: 那个没用的[suicide_duel_target.GetManWoman]简直一无是处！尽管你不停尝试给[suicide_duel_target.GetHerHim]机会，[suicide_duel_target.GetTitledFirstName]用尽全力只是划了你几下。

original: Everything seemed to go according to plan. [suicide_duel_target.GetTitledFirstName] did not mind your feeble attempts at defense and soon you were on your knees, ready to feel the kiss of [suicide_duel_target.GetHerHis] blade on your neck. Instead, it was the pommel which [suicide_duel_target.GetSheHe] smashed into the back of your head...
translation: 一切都按着计划进行，[suicide_duel_target.GetTitledFirstName]根本就没在意你的防御为何如此无力。很快你就被打得双膝跪地，准备好迎接[suicide_duel_target.GetHerHis]利刃，然而[suicide_duel_target.GetSheHe]却直接拎起锤子砸向了你的后脑勺……

original: A noble death.
translation: 光荣离世。

original: This is useless. There must be another way.
translation: 这招没用，我得再想想其他办法。

original: For this failure, [From.GetFirstName] is the one who will lose their head!
translation: 因为这次失败，[From.GetFirstName]要丢掉他的脑袋了！

original: I wanted death, not this! Not another prison...
translation: 我想要的是死亡和解脱，不是另一个监狱……

original: As soon as you drew your blades, you knew something was wrong. [From.GetTitledFirstName] barely attempted to parry your blows. Perhaps it was dishonorable of you to take advantage of the situation, although no one will know...
translation: 当你拔出剑刃时，你立刻知道有什么不对劲。[From.GetTitledFirstName]根本就只会挡开你的攻击。虽然利用这种情势是非常无耻的行为，但是毕竟没人知道……

original: Perhaps your thirst for [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s blood got the better of you. As soon as your blades met for the first time, it felt as if you stood no chance. Yet [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] must have been on your side, for instead of slaying you, [From.GetFirstName] cast away [From.GetHerHis] sword in anger...
translation: 也许是你对[From.GetTitledFirstName]鲜血的渴望占据了你全部思维。当你和他的剑锋相交时便知道你根本没有胜算。但是[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]保佑，[From.GetFirstName]没有杀死你，只是扔下[From.GetHerHis]剑愤怒地离开了……

original: That [GetRootFromInsult] is with [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] now.
translation: 那个[GetRootFromInsult]现在去见[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]了。

original: [From.GetFirstName] has pestered me for the last time!
translation: 这是[From.GetFirstName]最后一次激怒我了！

original: I am lucky to be alive.
translation: 我能活下来真幸运。

original: It had barely been a few moments before you started to cough blood after ingesting the poisonous brew you had concocted. Finally, you would be released from this dreary world...
translation: 你在喝下你调制的毒酒仅仅几秒钟后便开始咳血。终于，你可以离开这个无趣的世界了……

original: It had barely been a few moments before you started to cough blood after ingesting the poisonous brew you had concocted. Finally, you would be released… At least so you thought. Soon the coughing stopped, and all you were left with was a faint nausea.
translation: 你在喝下你调制的毒酒仅仅几分钟后便开始咳血。终于，你认为自己可以离开……不过这只是你的一厢情愿，很快咳血就止住了，你只剩下轻微的恶心。

original: Now, the endless rest...
translation: 现在，拥抱永眠……

original: [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], why do you deny me death?!
translation: [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]，你为什么不想我死？！

original: Once, you had been told that hanging was the preferable method of ending one's life. You told yourself this as you put the noose around your neck. The feeling of dread was short-lived as the quick fall blessed you with nothingness.
translation: 你曾经听别人说过上吊自杀是结束生命最好的方式。你在套上绞绳的时候不断地安慰自己。然而害怕只是短暂的，在你落下后不久便什么都感觉不到了。

original: Once, a man told you that hanging was the preferable method of ending one's life. Perhaps he should have told you about the importance of a long drop… Instead you were left hanging, the rope slowly cutting into you neck, until [found_hanger.GetTitledFirstName] happened to stumble upon you...
translation: 你曾经听某人说过上吊自杀是结束生命最好的方式，但是他也应该告诉你下落距离的重要性……你并没有直接吊死，绳子慢慢地勒紧你的脖子，直到[found_hanger.GetTitledFirstName]路过发现你还活着……

original: You indulged in one last look at the surrounding landscape before you climbed the railing. It was a beautiful sight, yet you would not miss it. A deep breath, and then you fell, free as a bird…
translation: 你在高塔上流连，不停地欣赏着绝妙的美景。直到你下定决心翻过护栏并坠向虚无。那真是道靓丽的风景，但是你是不会再错过了。深呼吸过后，你跌向地面，就像鸟儿般自由……

original: You had one last look at the surrounding landscape before you climbed the railing and stepped into nothingness. Impact was swifter than you had anticipated. Instead of oblivion you were overcome with excruciating pain. As from thousands of leagues away, you could hear screaming...
translation: 你在高塔上流连，不停地欣赏着绝妙的美景。直到你下定决心翻过护栏并坠向虚无。然而现实不尽人意，坠落的冲击比你想象的要小，你获得的不是解脱而是无法忍受的痛苦。你模模糊糊地听见一声尖叫，如同是数十公里之外传来的一样。

original: Your body has become a prison. This is no way to live. During one of your rare moments of clear thought, you notice [suicide_assistant.GetTitledFirstName] sitting by your bedside. [suicide_assistant.GetSheHeCap] must help you… must end it…
translation: 你的身体成了活生生的牢狱。这样苟活根本无法忍受。一次难得的机会，你恢复了清醒的意识，发现[suicide_assistant.GetTitledFirstName]坐在你的身边。[suicide_assistant.GetSheHeCap]一定要帮助我……必须结束这一切……

original: Your body has become a prison. This is no way to live. During one of your rare moments of clear thought, you notice someone sitting at your bedside. They must help you… must end it…
translation: 你的身体成了活生生的牢狱，这样苟活根本无法忍受。一次难得的机会，你恢复了清醒的意识，发现有个人坐在你的身边。一定要帮助我……必须结束这一切……

original: Mercy, [suicide_assistant.GetFirstName]. No more… Please…
translation: 救救我，[suicide_assistant.GetFirstName]。我无法忍受了……求你了……

original: I beg of you, mercy. No more… Please…
translation: 我请求你，救救我。我无法忍受了……求你了……

original: You are sitting by your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s sickbed, half asleep, when [From.GetHerHis] faint voice pierces through your foggy mind. You lean in, urging [From.GetHerHim] to repeat [From.GetHerselfHimself]. [From.GetHerHisCap] words leave you cold. "End it… please."
translation: 你坐在你[GetFromRelation][From.GetTitledFirstName]的病榻旁正假寐着，忽然[From.GetHerHis]微弱的声音穿过你模糊的意识。你前倾过去，急切地希望[From.GetHerHim]再重复一边[From.GetHerselfHimself]所说的话。随后，[From.GetHerHisCap]请求让你不禁打了个寒颤。「结束这一切吧……求求你了。」

original: I will release you from your suffering, dear [GetFromRelation].
translation: 我会将你从痛苦中解脱出来的，亲爱的[GetFromRelation]。

original: You are speaking nonsense! I will do no such thing!
translation: 不要再说胡话了，我不会那么做的！

original: Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s hand clutches yours, and through the fog of your mind you hear [From.GetHerHis] voice. "Do not worry, [Root.GetFirstName]. It will be over soon…" A heavy weight presses down on your throat. Weakly, you struggle… Then you are no more.
translation: [GetFromRelation][From.GetTitledFirstName]紧紧握住了你的手，你在意识模糊不清的状态下听到了[From.GetHerHis]声音。「不用担心，[Root.GetFirstName]。很快一切都会结束了……」随后你的喉咙被重物压住。你轻微挣扎……不过一会后便平静下来了。

original: A hand clutches yours, and through the fog of your mind you hear a voice. "Do not worry, [Root.GetFirstName]. It will be over soon…" A heavy weight presses down on your throat. Weakly, you struggle… Then you are no more.
translation: 那个人紧紧握住了你的手，你在意识模糊不清的状态下听到了他的声音。「不用担心，[Root.GetFirstName]。很快一切都会结束了……」随后你的喉咙被重物压住。你轻微挣扎……不过一会后便平静下来了。

original: The sound of something as it clatters to the floor pierces through the fog of your mind. You hear [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s voice, from far away… It is tinged with fear, denial. Hurried footsteps. You are alone once more.
translation: 你迷迷糊糊地听见有什么东西在地板上咯吱地响。同时你听见了[From.GetTitledFirstName]的声音，好像从远处传来……其中夹杂着恐惧，拒绝。一阵急促的脚步声后，你再次孤身一人。

original: Come back... [From.GetFirstName]...
translation: 快回来……[From.GetFirstName]……

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! must have a reason to commit suicide.\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!肯定是有自己的理由去自杀的。\n

original: Some days being [Root.GetTitle] is no easy thing. There is always business to attend to, subjects seeking audiences and vassals complaining about imagined injustices. Finally you are having a moment to yourself, strolling the gardens. In the distance you spot a stranger dressed in a simple garb.
translation: 有时当一个称职的[Root.GetTitle]真的很难。总有很多事务需要管理，不是子民请求觐见就是封臣们抱怨受到了莫须有的亏待。终于你能有私人的时间了，不过正当你在花园中漫步时你远远地瞧见一位衣着简陋的陌生人。

original: I shall invite this [From.GetManWoman] to walk with me!
translation: 我将邀请[From.GetManWoman]和我去散散心！

original: I'd rather be alone.
translation: 我宁愿独自一人。

original: It turns out that the stranger, [From.GetFirstName], is a nun on [From.GetHerHis] way back to the cloister after several months on the road. As the evening light grows dimmer, you converse about life and death, faith and doubt. When you excuse yourself to return home, the nun asks if you can offer room and board for a few days.
translation: 结果这名陌生人，[From.GetFirstName]，是一位修女，已在外数月，在回到[From.GetHerHis]修道院的路上。你们谈论着生与死，信仰与疑惑的话题，直到夜晚的灯火也快要熄灭。当你想要抱歉道别时，这位修女询问你能否给她一间房间和床铺让她停留数日。

original: It turns out that the stranger, [From.GetFirstName], is a monk on his way back to the cloister after several months on the road. As the evening light grows dimmer, you converse about life and death, faith and doubt. When you excuse yourself to return home, the monk asks if you can offer room and board for a few days.
translation: 结果这名陌生人，[From.GetFirstName]，是一位修士，已在外数月，在回到[From.GetHerHis]修道院的路上。你们谈论着生与死，信仰与疑惑的话题，直到夜晚的灯火也快要熄灭。当你想要抱歉道别时，这位修士询问你能否给她一间房间和床铺让他停留数日。

original: It turns out that the stranger, [From.GetFirstName], is a [catholic.GetName] nun on her way back to the cloister after several months on the road. As the evening light grows dimmer, you converse about life and death, her God and [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. When you excuse yourself to return home, the nun asks if you can offer room and board for a few days.
translation: 结果这名陌生人，[From.GetFirstName]，是一位[catholic.GetName]的修女，已在外数月，在回到她修道院的路上。你们谈论着生与死，她的神与[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的话题，直到夜晚的灯火也快要熄灭。当你想要抱歉道别时，这位修女询问你能否给她一间房间和床铺让她停留数日。

original: It turns out that the stranger, [From.GetFirstName], is a [catholic.GetName] monk on his way back to the cloister after several months on the road. As the evening light grows dimmer, you converse about life and death, his God and [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. When you excuse yourself to return home, the monk asks if you can offer room and board for a few days.
translation: 结果这名陌生人，[From.GetFirstName]，是一位[catholic.GetName]的修士，已在外数月，在回到他的修道院的路上。你们谈论着生与死，他的神与[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的话题，直到夜晚的灯火也快要熄灭。当你想要抱歉道别时，这位修士询问你能否给他一间房间和床铺让他停留数日。

original: Of course, [From.GetFirstName]! You shall find rest by my hearth.
translation: 当然了，[From.GetFirstName]！你将会在我温暖的炉火旁睡个好觉的。

original: Invite §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! to stay with you for a few days.\n
translation: 邀请§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!和你住上几天。\n

original: There is an excellent inn not far from here.
translation: 我知道旁边有家不错的旅馆。

original: Give §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! some money and direct [From.GetHerHim] to the inn.\n
translation: 给§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!一点钱并将[From.GetHerHim]带到那家旅馆。\n

original: Isn't a bit of suffering the point of a pilgrimage?
translation: 受苦难道不是朝圣的目的吗？

original: I will not have an infidel under my roof!
translation: 我不允许异教徒和我住在一个屋檐下！

original: Turn away §Y[From.GetFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 拒绝§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!。\n

original: For Whom The Bells Toll
translation: 丧钟为谁而鸣

original: More often than not, you retreat to your chambers in the evening feeling exhausted and weary. Tonight is no exception. Falling asleep is usually easy after a long and taxing day, however recently, sleep seems to elude you. You are sitting in your study, idly moving chess pieces on the board before you, sipping a glass of wine hoping that it shall give you the rest you seek.\n\nSuddenly, someone knocks. Who could it be at this hour? Before you can shout at the intruder to leave you alone, the door opens and [From.GetFirstName] strides in. "Good evening, my [Root.GetLordLady]. I realized that I never introduced myself properly. I am Death, and I am here to collect you." A dagger is glinting in [From.GetHerHis] hand…
translation: 如同平常一般，你在深夜拖着沉重疲乏的身躯回到卧室。今天也是如此。在经历了漫长而劳累的一天后，入睡会变得相当容易，但是最近睡眠好像在刻意避开你一般。你坐在你的书房中，呆滞地移动着棋盘上的棋子，不时小抿一口红酒希望依靠酒精重获睡意。\n\n突然，你听见有人敲门，这么晚了会是谁呢？在你喊话让那人回去之前，门打开了，[From.GetFirstName]大步走了进来。「晚上好，[Root.GetLordLady]。我想起我还从没正式介绍过我自己。我是死神，我是来这收割你的。」你看到[From.GetHerHis]手中握着一把闪亮的匕首……

original: More often than not, you retreat to your chambers in the evening feeling exhausted and weary. Tonight is no exception. Falling asleep is usually easy after a long and taxing day, however recently, sleep seems to elude you. You are sitting in your study, idly moving chess pieces on the board before you, sipping a glass of wine hoping that it shall give you the rest you seek.\n\nSuddenly, you hear a sound behind you, and you turn around in your chair. There stands the [From.GetManWoman] you walked with a few days ago. "Good evening, my [Root.GetLordLady]. I realized that I never introduced myself properly. I am Death, and I am here to collect you." A dagger is glinting in [From.GetHerHis] hand…
translation: 如同平常一般，你在深夜拖着沉重疲乏的身躯回到卧室。今天也是如此。但是不同以往你劳累一天后便会倒头就睡，最近睡眠好像在刻意避开你一般。你坐在你的书房中，呆滞地移动着棋盘上的棋子，不时小抿一口红酒希望依靠酒精重获睡意。\n\n突然，你听见身后好像有人走动，你在椅子上转过身来。看见了几天前和你散步的[From.GetManWoman]。「晚上好，[Root.GetLordLady]。我还没自我介绍呢。我是死神，我是来这收割你的灵魂的。」你看到[From.GetHerHis]手中握着一把闪亮的匕首……

original: More often than not, you retreat to your chambers in the evening feeling exhausted and weary. Tonight is no exception. Falling asleep is usually easy after a long and taxing day, however recently, sleep seems to elude you. You are sitting in your study, idly moving chess pieces on the board before you, sipping a glass of wine hoping that it shall give you the rest you seek.\n\nSuddenly, you hear a sound behind you, and you turn around in your chair. There stands a [From.GetManWoman] you have never seen before, a faint smile on [From.GetHerHis] lips. "Good evening, my [Root.GetLordLady]. I am Death, and I am here to collect you." A dagger is glinting in [From.GetHerHis] hand…
translation: 如同平常一般，你在深夜拖着沉重疲乏的身躯回到卧室。今天也是如此。但是不同以往你劳累一天后便会倒头就睡，最近睡眠好像在刻意避开你一般。你坐在你的书房中，呆滞地移动着棋盘上的棋子，不时小抿一口红酒希望依靠酒精重获睡意。\n\n突然，你听见身后好像有人走动，你在椅子上转过身来。一个你从没见过的[From.GetManWoman]站在那站在那，[From.GetHerHis]嘴上带着一丝笑意。「晚上好，[Root.GetLordLady]。我是死神，我是来这收割你的灵魂的。」你看到[From.GetHerHis]手中握着一把闪亮的匕首……

original: I… I challenge you to a game of chess!
translation: 我……我要向你挑战下棋！

original: Attempt to buy yourself time by challenging §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! to a game of chess.
translation: 你试图向§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!挑战棋艺来争取时间。

original: Not today!
translation: 想得美！

original: Launch yourself at §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! in an attempt to overpower [From.GetHerHim].\n
translation: 冲向§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!试图撞倒[From.GetHerHim]。\n

original: surviving the assassination attempt, however, you are likely to be injured in the struggle.
translation: 努力活过刺杀，然而你很可能在缠斗过程中受伤。

original: Afterwards, you barely know what happened. It was over in a few moments of blind rage and fear. The dagger clatters to the floor as you release it. Your legs buckle under you, and you fall hard in a puddle of sticky, warm blood. Yours or [From.GetHerHis]? It is unclear...
translation: 之后你回忆不起发生了什么。打斗很快就在愤怒和害怕的推动下结束了。从你手中扔下的匕首咣当一声跌落在地面上。你的双腿一软使你摔倒在地，躺在一片血泊之中。是你的还是[From.GetHerHis]血？你并不清楚……

original: Help… guards...
translation: 卫兵……救命……

original: [From.GetFirstName] raises an eyebrow, an amused look on [From.GetHerHis] face. "Why not? I have all the time in the world. Though you are simply postponing the inevitable, [Root.GetFirstName], for you are sure to lose." [From.GetSheHeCap] settles in the chair opposite your own and places the dagger on the table. "Black or white?"
translation: [From.GetFirstName]抬了抬眉毛，愉悦的神情浮现在[From.GetHerHis]脸上。「为何不呢？我拥有这世上的所有时间。你也不过是想拖延必将到来的死亡而已，[Root.GetFirstName]，因为你必定会输的。」随后[From.GetSheHeCap]便把匕首放在桌上并走到你对面的椅子上坐下。「黑方还是白方？」

original: The white pieces, please.
translation: 我当白方，谢谢。

original: You pick the white pieces and the game begins.
translation: 你选择白方，棋局开始。

original: I will play as black.
translation: 我要当黑方。

original: You pick the black pieces and the game begins.
translation: 你将作为黑方，棋局开始。

original: "Black, my lucky color… Well, it matters not", [From.GetFirstName] says with a nonchalant shrug.\n\nWhat is your strategy for the first part of the game?
translation: 「啊，黑色，我的幸运色……不过没关系」，[From.GetFirstName]若无其事地耸耸肩。\n\n你准备如何开局呢？

original: "White… Yes, you will need all the help you can get", [From.GetFirstName] says with a grin.\n\nWhat is your strategy for the first part of the game?
translation: 「白色……不错，估计你需要你能得到的所有帮助」，[From.GetFirstName]咧嘴笑了起来。\n\n你准备如何开局呢？

original: It is safest to play defensive.
translation: 还是防御吧，毕竟要稳。

original: I will take advantage of any opening, no matter the risk.
translation: 我要利用我先走棋的优势，不要在乎风险。

original: I'm not above cheating, if the opportunity presents itself.
translation: 我不会介意耍诈的，只要有机会。

original: I have a well-practiced strategy in mind.
translation: 我已经有一套成熟的战术了。

original: I will carefully analyze the board and take my time.
translation: 我要慢慢来，先好好观察棋局。

original: you making a great move.
translation: 你的这步棋下得非常好。

original: you making a good move.
translation: 你的这步棋下得不错。

original: you making a neutral move.
translation: 你的这步棋下得不好不坏。

original: you making a bad move.
translation: 你的这步棋下得不好。

original: you making a terrible move.
translation: 你的这步棋下得非常烂。

original: of you cheating successfully.
translation: 你成功作弊。

original: of you botching the attempt to cheat.
translation: 你试图作弊但是搞砸了。

original: In the first few minutes of the game, you manage to advance across the board, taking out several of [From.GetFirstName]'s pieces while barely suffering any losses yourself. As you capture [From.GetHerHis] second knight, [From.GetSheHe] clicks [From.GetHerHis] tongue testily. "Do not get too confident. It is not over yet."
translation: 在这开局的几分钟内，你成功地占据了优势并且几乎在没有损失的情况下便吃掉了[From.GetFirstName]的数个棋子。当你吃掉[From.GetHerHis]第二个马后，[From.GetSheHe]不耐烦地咂了咂[From.GetHerHis]嘴。「不要太过自信了，游戏还没结束呢。」

original: While [From.GetFirstName] is certainly an accomplished player, you manage to capture a few more pieces than [From.GetHerHim] during the first part of the game. You do not like the look on [From.GetHerHis] face, however…
translation: [From.GetFirstName]果真是一个强力的对手，开局你只比[From.GetHerHim]多吃了几个棋子。你非常不喜[From.GetHerHis]脸上的表情，不过……

original: It is impossible to tell who has the upper hand after the first part of the game. While you have captured a few more pieces than [From.GetFirstName], [From.GetHerHis] position on the board surely looks more promising. [From.GetHerHisCap] ominous smile makes you anxious...
translation: 双方实力平分秋色。你虽然比[From.GetFirstName]多吃了几个棋子，但是[From.GetHerHis]布局显然更周全。不过最让你不安的还是[From.GetHerHisCap]不详的微笑……

original: It has only been a few minutes when you realize just how badly it is going. At first you thought you were safe, having kept almost all of your pieces, but now you can see how [From.GetFirstName] has positioned [From.GetHerHis] own. Is it too late to turn this game around?
translation: 仅仅几分钟后你意识到局势非常差。一开始你觉得自己很安全，几乎保住了所有棋子，但现在你能看出来[From.GetFirstName]是如何布局[From.GetHerHis]棋子的。这盘棋想要翻盘是不是太晚了一点……

original: Thank [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] for my good fortune! Please let it continue...
translation: 感谢[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的神佑赐予了我好运气，只希望这好事不会就这样结束……

original: Curses upon that [GetRootFromInsult]!
translation: 诅咒这[GetRootFromInsult]！

original: The game continues...
translation: 游戏还在继续……

original: You try to keep your nerves in check, although it is nearly impossible. You are in the lead! The scowl on [From.GetFirstName] has renewed your hopes. Or is it just a trick…?\n\nWhat is your next move?
translation: 你试图控制住自己的情绪，虽然那是几乎不可能的。因为你现在大幅领先！[From.GetFirstName]的怒容给予你新的希望。或者这一切都是他在下的很大一盘棋……？\n\n你的下一步行动是？

original: The game continues in silence as both of you are fully focused on your next move. At the moment, the game seems even. At least you think it does… \n\nWhat is your next move?
translation: 棋局在一片死寂中进行，你们两个都全神贯注地思索自己的下一步。目前，场面看上去还是僵持的。至少你是这么认为的……\n\n你的下一步行动是？

original: The game is not going well. There is a heavy, cold feeling at the pit of your stomach. You wish you could vomit, but somehow you think that would only please [From.GetFirstName] further... \n\nWhat is your next move?
translation: 局面进行的并不顺利，你的腹中有如坠了铅块一般沉重冰冷。你希望自己能吐出来，但你总感觉这只会让[From.GetFirstName]更加愉悦……\n\n你的下一步准备怎么走？

original: If [From.GetFirstName] starts drinking, maybe [From.GetSheHe] will lose [From.GetHerHis] edge!
translation: 如果[From.GetFirstName]开始喝酒，也许[From.GetSheHe]会失去[From.GetHerHis]状态！

original: Pour §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! a glass and keep refilling it throughout the game. Surely you can outdrink [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 给§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!给杯子并不断他灌酒。凭你的酒量是有可能赢[From.GetHerHim]的。

original: No one can withstand my charms, not even Death.
translation: 没人能抗拒我的魅力，连死神都不行。

original: Attempt to distract §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! with your renowned skills of seduction.
translation: 试图用你远近闻名的勾引技巧魅惑§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!。

original: I will tell [From.GetFirstName] a little tale…
translation: 要不我给[From.GetFirstName]讲个小故事吧……

original: Attempt to make §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! nervous by telling [From.GetHerHim] what you usually do to those you defeat.
translation: 试图让§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!紧张起来，告诉[From.GetHerHim]你通常如何对待你的手下败将。

original: I shall tell [From.GetFirstName] of the crushing defeat my last opponent suffered.
translation: 我应该告诉[From.GetFirstName]我的上一个对手遭遇了怎样的惨败。

original: Attempt to make §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! nervous by bragging about your chess skills.
translation: 通过吹嘘你的棋艺来使§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!紧张。

original: If I distract [From.GetFirstName], perhaps I can return one of my lost pieces to the board.
translation: 如果我使得[From.GetFirstName]分心，或许我能偷偷把一个我失去的棋子放回棋盘上。

original: Knock over your wine glass in an attempt to distract §Y[From.GetFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 尝试通过敲击红酒杯来使§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!分心。\n

original: It is best to just focus on the game.
translation: 还是把注意放在棋局上。

original: You almost cannot believe it, but surely it is so – the plan is successful! While your mind is still sharp enough, [From.GetFirstName] seems to have lost some of [From.GetHerHis] focus. You fill up [From.GetHerHis] cup again and [From.GetSheHe] nods absentmindedly in response.
translation: 你几乎无法相信，但事实就是如此——计划成功了！你的思维依旧敏锐，[From.GetFirstName]看上去无法集中[From.GetHerHis]精神。你又一次倒满了[From.GetHerHis]酒杯而[From.GetSheHe]的回应只是无意识地点点头。

original: You almost cannot believe it, but surely it is so – the plan is successful! You were right, not even [From.GetFirstName] is immune to your charms and seems to have lost some of [From.GetHerHis] focus. As you lean forwards over the table, pretending to contemplate your next move, you can hear [From.GetHerHis] breath hitch.
translation: 你几乎无法相信，但事实就是如此——计划成功了！你是对的，即使是[From.GetFirstName]也无法抵挡你的魅力，[From.GetHerHis]精力已经有点无法集中了。当你隔着桌子探出身去，假装冥思苦想下一合该怎么走时，你能听到[From.GetHerHis]呼吸都停滞了。

original: You almost cannot believe it, but surely it is so – the plan is successful! As you keep playing, you tell [From.GetFirstName] stories about your victims in intricate detail, accentuating the most shocking parts by slamming your pieces against the board. [From.GetSheHeCap] seems to have lost some of [From.GetHerHis] focus.
translation: 你几乎无法相信，但事实就是如此——计划成功了！一边下棋，你一边绘声绘色地告诉[From.GetFirstName]你手下受害者的故事，把棋子狠砸在棋盘上来强调最吓人的部分。[From.GetSheHeCap]看上去无法集中[From.GetHerHis]精神。

original: You almost cannot believe it, but surely it is so – the plan is successful! As you keep playing, you tell [From.GetFirstName] stories about your masterful chess skills, and prove them too by some clever moves. [From.GetSheHeCap] seems to have lost some of [From.GetHerHis] focus.
translation: 你几乎无法相信，但事实就是如此——计划成功了！一边下棋，你一边告诉[From.GetFirstName]你大师级棋艺的故事，同时用妙招来证明这些故事。[From.GetSheHeCap]看上去无法集中[From.GetHerHis]精神。

original: You almost cannot believe it, but surely it is so – the plan is successful! The wine spills all over [From.GetFirstName]'s garb. As [From.GetSheHe] rubs a cloth on the huge, red stain, cursing you under [From.GetHerHis] breath, you restore one of your rooks. That was worth getting called a [GetFromRootInsult], for sure!
translation: 你几乎无法相信，但事实就是如此——计划成功了！红酒整个洒在[From.GetFirstName]的粗布衣服上。看见[From.GetSheHe]用一块布擦拭那片巨大的红印子，在[From.GetHerHis]呼吸声中诅咒你，你迅速放回了你的一只车。就算被人骂一声[GetFromRootInsult]肯定也值了！

original: The wine spills all over [From.GetFirstName]'s garb. As [From.GetSheHe] rubs a cloth on the huge, red stain, cursing you under [From.GetHerHis] breath, you attempt to restore one of your rooks. For a moment, you think your move went undetected, but then [From.GetFirstName] scans the board and sighs "Oh, how I despise cheaters…"
translation: 红酒整个洒在[From.GetFirstName]的粗布衣服上。看见[From.GetSheHe]用一块布擦拭那片巨大的红印子，在[From.GetHerHis]呼吸声中诅咒你，你试图放回你的一只车。一瞬间，你觉得自己的动作没被发现，但接着[From.GetFirstName]扫了一眼棋盘叹息道：「啊，我多么瞧不起作弊者……」

original: Perhaps I can win this, after all!
translation: 我感觉我最后能赢！

original: No, wait, it's not what you think!
translation: 不，等等，这不是你想的那样！

original: §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! reaches for the dagger...\n
translation: §Y[From.GetFirstName]§!将手伸向匕首……\n

original: Never have you met such a tenacious, unnerving opponent and never have so much been at stake. The game is nearing its end, and seemingly against all odds you have the upper hand. [From.GetFirstName] slams your captured rook down on the table. "I could be persuaded to return this to you, for the right price…"
translation: 你从未见过如此顽强且令人焦躁的对手，也从未陷入如此多的困境。临近终局，看起来随历经重重困境但你还是占了上风。[From.GetFirstName]捏着你被吃掉的车狠敲了一下桌子，「我愿意把这个还给你，但要给足价钱……」

original: Never have you met such a tenacious, unnerving opponent and never have so much been at stake. The game is nearing its end, and it is looking even, indeed. [From.GetFirstName] is playing with your captured queen, smiling confidently. "I could be persuaded to return this to you, for the right price…"
translation: 你从未见过如此顽强且令人焦躁的对手，也从未陷入如此多的困境。临近终局，但棋盘上依旧难分高下。[From.GetFirstName]把玩着你被吃掉的王后，自信地微笑着，「我可以把这个还给你，但要给足价钱……」

original: Never have you met such a tenacious, unnerving opponent and never have so much been at stake. The game is nearing its end, and it is looking grim, indeed. [From.GetFirstName] is playing with your captured queen, smiling confidently. "I could be persuaded to return this to you, for the right price…"
translation: 你从未见过如此顽强且令人焦躁的对手，也从未陷入如此多的困境。临近终局，结果看起来很不舒心。[From.GetFirstName]把玩着你被吃掉的王后，自信地微笑着，「我可以把这个还给你，但要给足价钱……」

original: No, thank you. I put my trust in my skill.
translation: 不了，谢谢。我相信我的技术

original: The life of my [chess_sacrifice.GetHusbandWife], [chess_sacrifice.GetTitledFirstName]. If I lose, [chess_sacrifice.GetSheHe] is yours.
translation: 我拿我[chess_sacrifice.GetHusbandWife]，[chess_sacrifice.GetTitledFirstName]的生命赌！如果我输了，[chess_sacrifice.GetSheHe]就是你的了。

original: The life of my friend, [chess_sacrifice.GetTitledFirstName]. If I lose, [chess_sacrifice.GetSheHe] is yours.
translation: 我拿我的朋友，[chess_sacrifice.GetTitledFirstName]的生命赌！如果我输了，[chess_sacrifice.GetSheHe]就是你的了。

original: The life of my lover, [chess_sacrifice.GetTitledFirstName]. If I lose, [chess_sacrifice.GetSheHe] is yours.
translation: 我拿我恋人，[chess_sacrifice.GetTitledFirstName]的生命赌！如果我输了，[chess_sacrifice.GetSheHe]就是你的了。

original: The life of my [chess_sacrifice.GetSonDaughter], [chess_sacrifice.GetTitledFirstName]. If I lose, [chess_sacrifice.GetSheHe] is yours.
translation: 我拿我[chess_sacrifice.GetSonDaughter]，[chess_sacrifice.GetTitledFirstName]的生命赌！如果我输了，[chess_sacrifice.GetSheHe]就是你的了。

original: Dealings with Death
translation: 与死神的交易

original: During the last few moves, it feels as if time is standing still. Your thoughts are muddled, moving slowly as if through a thick syrup. Random, disjointed thoughts flashes through your mind. Places you once visited, old friends you have not seen in years, dreams you gave up on. So many loose ends, and now it might be too late to pick them up again. \n\n"Checkmate." Your head snaps back up, your eyes locking with [From.GetFirstName]'s. For the first time this evening, you can really see it, and it chills you to your core. The figure before you is not an ordinary [From.GetManWoman], not a [From.GetManWoman] at all. This is Death, and [From.GetSheHe] just won. "It is time then, [Root.GetFirstName]", [From.GetSheHe] sighs contentedly. "The endless rest awaits."
translation: 在最后几步，时间似乎凝固了。你思维混乱，运转缓慢，如同正在穿过一片厚厚的糖浆。随机而不连贯的思绪在你的心灵中闪现。你去过的地方，你好几年没见过的朋友，你放弃的梦想。如此多事情尚未完成，现在再捡起来恐怕太晚了。\n\n「将军。」你的头猛地抬起来，死盯着[From.GetFirstName]的双眼。今晚第一次，你真正看清楚了这双眼睛，让你冻彻骨髓。你眼前的人形并非普通的[From.GetManWoman]，甚至完全就不是[From.GetManWoman]。这是死亡，而[From.GetSheHe]刚刚胜利。「是时候了，[Root.GetFirstName]」，[From.GetSheHe]满意地叹息。「长眠等候着你。」

original: During the last few moves, it feels as if time is standing still. Random, disjointed thoughts flashes through your mind. Places you once visited, old friends you have not seen in years, dreams you gave up on. Is it too late…? \n\nThen suddenly, you see it. The move. With a shaking hand, you pick up the bishop and set it down across the board with a soft thud. "Checkmate", you whisper, looking up into [From.GetFirstName]'s eyes. For the first time this evening, you can really see it, and it chills you to your core. This is no mortal [From.GetManWoman], but Death [From.GetHerselfHimself]. "It seems as if you have outwitted me, [Root.GetFirstName], so I will give you a few more years", [From.GetSheHe] sighs. "It is of little consequence, for in the end all come with me." And then, as you blink, [From.GetSheHe] is gone.
translation: 在最后几步，时间似乎凝固了。随机而不连贯的思绪在你的心灵中闪现。你去过的地方，你好几年没见过的朋友，你放弃的梦想。是不是太晚了……？\n\n突然间，你看到了它。那一步。伸出颤抖的手，你拿起主教跨过整个棋盘，用一声轻柔地闷响放下棋子。「将军」，你轻声道，看向[From.GetFirstName]的双眼。今晚第一次，你真正看清楚了这双眼睛，让你冻彻骨髓。这不是凡间的[From.GetManWoman]，而是死亡[From.GetHerselfHimself]。「似乎你在智慧上战胜了我，[Root.GetFirstName]，所以我会多给你几年生命」，[From.GetSheHe]叹道。「这没什么大不了的，最终所有人都将跟我走。」接着，你一眨眼，[From.GetSheHe]消失了。

original: That might be true, but for now, I shall live. Not a day will be wasted!
translation: 你不是在做梦，你还活着，至少现在还是。一定要好好珍惜接下来的每一天！

original: You feel stronger...\n
translation: 你感觉变得更强壮了……\n

original: Please, no, no… I beg of you, mercy! Just… just one more year!
translation: 不，求求你，不要……不，我求你了！就……就让我多活一年！

original: Skull Trophies
translation: 头骨战利品

original: This character owns the skulls of several deceased rivals.
translation: 这个角色拥有数个已故仇敌的头骨。

original: [Root.chess_score.GetValue]
translation: [Root.chess_score.GetValue]

original: Death's Gift
translation: 死神的礼物

original: This character has been given a second chance at life.
translation: 这个角色被给予了第二次生命的机会。

original: Praised be [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!
translation: 赞美[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]！

original: Today I decided to go and visit my dog at [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s residence. When I arrived I found them playing together most enthusiastically. I watched them for several minutes before I announced myself.
translation: 今天我准备去探望一下寄养在[From.GetTitledFirstName]的狗狗。当我到达时看到他们一起欢快地玩耍。我看着他们玩了几分钟后才出声表明自己来了。

original: Today I decided to go and visit my cat at [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s residence. When I arrived I found [From.GetHerHim] playing most enthusiastically with the little furball. I watched them for several minutes before I announced myself.
translation: 今天我决定去看望寄养在[From.GetTitledFirstName]的猫咪。当我到达时发现[From.GetHerHim]正欢快地和那只小毛球一起玩耍。我看着他们玩了几分钟后才出声表明自己来了。

original: Thank you, [From.GetFirstName], for taking such good care of my cat!
translation: 谢谢你，[From.GetFirstName]把我的猫咪照顾得这么好！

original: You and §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! bond over your love of cats.\n
translation: 你和§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!的关系因为你们对猫的热爱而加深了。\n

original: Thank you, [From.GetFirstName], for taking such good care of my dog!
translation: 谢谢你，[From.GetFirstName]，谢谢你把我的狗狗照顾的这么好！

original: You and §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! bond over your love of dogs.\n
translation: 你和§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!之间的友谊因为热爱狗的共同爱好而加深了。

original: Today I decided to go and visit my dog at [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s residence. However, when I arrived, [From.GetSheHe] could not produce the canine. When I angrily demanded to know the truth [From.GetSheHe] admitted to having gotten rid of the dog a few days earlier.
translation: 今天我准备去探望一下寄养在[From.GetTitledFirstName]的狗狗。当我到达时[From.GetSheHe]说他无法把狗给我。我愤怒地要求他给我个说法时[From.GetSheHe]只好承认几天前他就把狗给丢弃了。

original: Today I decided to go and visit my cat at [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s residence. However, when I arrived, [From.GetSheHe] could not produce the feline. When I angrily demanded to know the truth [From.GetSheHe] admitted to having gotten rid of the cat a few days earlier.
translation: 今天我准备去探望一下寄养在[From.GetTitledFirstName]的猫咪。当我到达时[From.GetSheHe]说他无法把猫给我。我愤怒地要求他给我个说法时[From.GetSheHe]只好承认几天前他就把猫给丢弃了。

original: What have you done, you [GetRootFromInsult]?!
translation: 你干了什么，你这[GetRootFromInsult]？！

original: You let §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! know exactly what you think of [From.GetHerHis] behaviour.\n
translation: 你让§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!知道你是怎么想[From.GetHerHis]行为的。\n

original: Pet Best Friends
translation: 宠物最好的朋友

original: This character has pets which are the best of friends.
translation: 这个角色养着宠物，并且是其最好的朋友。

original: Your two pets truly fight like cat and dog. You can barely sleep at night unless you lock them in separate rooms. In fear of confinement, your cat has begun hiding before bedtime. Yesterday you spent the better part of an hour looking for it. You cannot stand this much longer...
translation: 你的两只宠物就像典型的猫狗般整天互相撕咬打架。如果晚上不把他们分开关在不同的房间的话根本睡不了觉。渐渐地，你的猫由于害怕被关小黑屋于是每晚睡前便躲起来。昨天你花了快一个小时找它。你再也忍受不住了……

original: They will figure it out in due time.
translation: 他们会渐渐想出办法的。

original: You give your cat and dog a chance to get used to each other.
translation: 你给你的猫狗们一个机会去和彼此相处。

original: I will find a new owner for my dog.
translation: 我要给我的狗找个新主人。

original: The cat is obviously unhappy. I will get it a new home.
translation: 猫显然不高兴。我要给它找个新家。

original: Today, when you were going for a hunt, you couldn't find your loyal canine companion anywhere. As you called its name, the stable master came over and told you that he had seen a cat chase a dog across the courtyard. Now it is nowhere to be found…
translation: 今天，你要出门打猎时，到处都找不到你忠诚的犬科伙伴。当你呼唤它的名字时，马厩管事前来禀报说她曾看到一只猫在庭院里追一条狗。现在到处都找不到它了……

original: It is time to go to bed and you are searching for your cat. You attempt your most recent trick, luring it out with small treats from the kitchen, but for the first time the method proves unsuccessful. Once an hour has passed, you give up and call for your dog. It comes running with a limp little body in its maw…
translation: 到了就寝时间，你在找你的猫。你尝试了最近常用的把戏，用厨房的小食勾引它，但这方法第一次失效了。一小时过后，你放弃了，叫来你的狗。它口中叼着一具小小的躯体跑了过来……

original: Some time was just what your pets needed. One day they simply stopped fighting and since they have become the best of friends. Now you often find them playing or snoozing together. They really seem much happier.
translation: 你的宠物只是需要一些时间。一天它们突然不再打架了，从那以后成了最好的朋友。现在你经常看到它们在一起玩耍或打盹。它们看起来确实开心多了。

original: The fault is mine. The cat is just an animal...
translation: 都是我的错。猫不过是动物而已……

original: My dog is never coming back and it is all your fault, evil beast!
translation: 我的狗再也回不来了，都是你这孽畜的错！

original: Get rid off your cat.\n
translation: 驱逐你的猫。\n

original: The fault is mine. The dog is just an animal...
translation: 都是我的错。狗不过是动物而已……

original: How… how could you! Bad dog! BAD DOG!
translation: 你……怎么敢！恶狗！恶狗！

original: Get rid off your dog.\n
translation: 驱逐你的狗。\n

original: How sweet! I knew they would get along in the end.
translation: 真甜蜜啊！我知道它们最终会好好相处的。

original: §BWay of Life:§! Dueling
translation: §B「生活之道」：§!决斗

original: Default restrictions for dueling applies.
translation: 申请决斗的默认限制。

original: You no longer need a reason to duel someone, but they must still be healthy and a valid target in your culture and religion.
translation: 你向某人挑起决斗无需理由，但他们必须是健康的，且在你的文化和宗教中属有效目标。

original: Release Prisoners After Punishment
translation: 惩罚后释放囚犯

original: Prisoners are released after having received their punishment.
translation: 囚犯受到他们的惩罚后会被释放。

original: Blinding, castration, torture, mutilation, humiliation, and poetry readings no longer release prisoners.
translation: 致盲、阉割、拷打、截肢、羞辱和诗朗诵后不再释放囚犯。

original: §BThe Reaper's Due:§! Non-Epidemic Diseases
translation: §B「死神索命」：§!非传染性疾病

original: Characters will develop and contract non-epidemic diseases, such as pneumonia and cancer, at the default rate.
translation: 角色以默认概率产生和感染非传染性疾病，诸如肺炎和癌症。

original: There will be more cases of non-epidemic diseases.
translation: 非传染性疾病的案例增多。

original: There will be fewer cases of non-epidemic diseases.
translation: 非传染性疾病的案例减少。

original: Cases of non-epidemic diseases will be rare.
translation: 非传染性疾病的案例非常罕见。

original: There will be practically no cases of non-epidemic diseases.
translation: 非传染性疾病的案例完全不会产生。

original: §BThe Old Gods:§! Provincial Revolt Strength
translation: §B「逝往神灵」：§! 省份叛乱力量

original: The strength of provincial revolts is at the default level.
translation: 省份叛乱力量为默认水平。

original: Provincial revolts are powerful. Their armies are twice as numerous as at the default level.
translation: 省份叛乱强而有力。他们的军队是默认水平的两倍。

original: Provincial revolts are very powerful. Their armies are four times as numerous as at the default level.
translation: 省份叛乱非常强大。他们的军队是默认水平的四倍。

original: Provincial revolts are extremely powerful. Their armies are six times as numerous as at the default level.
translation: 省份叛乱极度强大。他们的军队是默认水平的六倍。

original: Powerful
translation: 强力

original: Very Powerful
translation: 非常强力

original: Extremely Powerful
translation: 极度强力

original: Multiplayer Assassinations
translation: 多人游戏暗杀

original: There are no additional restrictions on whom you can plot to kill in multiplayer.
translation: 对多人游戏中可密谋杀害的对象无额外限制。

original: Plotting to kill other players is disabled.
translation: 禁止密谋杀害其他玩家。

original: No Players
translation: 禁止玩家

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! gets to pick a new patron deity to worship.
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!开始选择崇拜一个新守护神。

original: Has not picked a patron deity for 10 years.\n
translation: 10年未选择守护神。\n

original: Pick Patron Deity
translation: 选择守护神

original: There are many gods and goddesses who rule over different aspects of our life. While all of them should be honored properly, it is common for people to pick a deity whom they pray and sacrifice to more often.
translation: 有许多男女神祇管理我们生活的方方面面。虽然对他们均应适当尊崇，但人们常常选择一位守护神并更常祈祷献祭。

original: There are many deities whom you may chose to honor. Will it be Perun, God of Thunder, the fiercest of warriors? Or perhaps his eternal nemesis Veles, God of the Underworld? Jarilo, the springtime God of Fertility, and his sister Morana, wintry God of Death and Rebirth, also possess mighty powers.
translation: 有很多神供你选择敬拜。是雷神佩龙，最强大的战士呢？还是他永远的对手，冥神维列斯？春日生育之神亚利洛和他的姐妹冬日死亡与新生之神莫拉娜也有强大的力量。

original: I pledge my axe to Perun. I would give my life for his honor!
translation: 我以战斧向佩龙立誓，向他的荣耀奉献生命！

original: Hallowed be wise Veles. No one can outwit him!
translation: 尊崇智慧的维列斯，无人能欺骗他！

original: May Jarilo bring prosperity and happiness to these lands!
translation: 愿亚利洛为这些土地带来财富和欢乐！

original: Mighty Morana, share your secrets with me, and I shall keep them.
translation: 强大的莫拉娜，我请求您与我分享您的秘密，我势必将守口如瓶。

original: Follower of Perun
translation: 佩龙的信徒

original: This character is a devout follower of Perun, the Slavic God of Thunder. He is also associated with fire, mountains and war.
translation: 这名角色是斯拉夫雷神佩龙的虔诚信徒。此神也掌管火焰、山脉和战争。

original: Follower of Veles
translation: 维列斯的信徒

original: This character is a devout follower of Veles, the Slavic God of the Underworld. He is also associated with water, music and trickery.
translation: 这名角色是斯拉夫冥神维列斯的虔诚信徒。此神也掌管水域、音乐和诡诈。

original: Follower of Jarilo
translation: 亚利洛的信徒

original: This character is a devout follower of Jarilo, the Slavic God of Fertility. He is also associated with spring and vegetation.
translation: 这名角色是斯拉夫生育之神亚利洛的虔诚信徒。此神也掌管春天和植被。

original: Follower of Morana
translation: 莫拉娜的信徒

original: This character is a devout follower of Morana, the Slavic Godess of Death and Rebirth. She is also associated with winter, magic and dreams.
translation: 这名角色是斯拉夫死亡与重生之女神莫拉娜的虔诚信徒。此神也掌管冬天、魔法和梦境。
