original: Perun, the God of Thunder, is the highest of all the gods. He sits atop the world tree from where he keeps watch over the earth and the skies. His sworn enemy is Veles the Serpent, who crawls up from the Underworld to steal his cattle and children. On stormy nights, thunder is a sign of Perun defending us against Veles.
translation: 雷神佩伦乃是至高神。他端坐世界树顶端观察地球和诸天。誓与他为敌的大蛇维列斯则从冥府爬上来窃取佩伦的牛只和子女。风暴之夜的闪电是佩伦从维列斯手中保护我们的征兆。

original: While Perun might rule our earthly world, wise and sly Veles is the God of the Underworld, where all of us will end up one day. His realm is not a dark and barren one, but wet and lush. Veles' chosen devote their life to carrying out his desires in this world, with the hopes of a glorious afterlife in the next.
translation: 佩伦管理尘世之时，智慧而狡黠的维列斯则统御地府，我们终将到达之处。他的领地并不黑暗和贫瘠，而是潮湿且繁茂的。维列斯的选民在此世终身履行他的欲望，希望得到荣耀的死后生活。

original: Jarilo, the God of Fertility, is the son of Perun. He and his sister Morana were born on new year's eve, although Jarilo was snatched from his cradle by Veles, and brought up as his son in the Underworld. When Jarilo returned to the earthly realm, he brought with him warmth and lushness, thus creating spring.
translation: 生育之神亚利洛是佩伦之子，他与莫拉娜生于除夕之夜，但亚利洛随后被维列斯从摇篮中抢走，在地府当做自己的儿子养大。亚利洛回到尘世时带回了温暖与丰饶，从此有了春天。

original: Morana, the Goddess of Death and Rebirth, is a mighty but vengeful mistress. When her brother and husband Jarilo cheated on her, she slew him. Without him the world withered and froze, thus creating winter. Morana holds many secrets and spells which she bestows on her most faithful followers.
translation: 死亡与重生之女神莫拉娜是一位强大而有报复心的女神。当她的兄长和丈夫亚利洛欺骗她时，她就杀掉他。世界因此枯萎冰冻，因而有了冬天。莫拉娜有许多秘密和咒文，授予最虔诚的信徒。

original: I hope to prove myself a worthy follower.
translation: 我希望能证明自己是合格的信徒。

original:
To the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

Due to the affliction spreading through [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] I have been forced to seclude myself with my court at [From.Location.GetName]. Thus I will not fulfill my duties as [From.GetJobTitle] until the crisis is over.

Signed, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootInsult][Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

由于在[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]不断扩散的灾祸，我被迫在[From.Location.GetName]的宫廷中被隔离。因此直到此次危机结束之前我将不能履行作为[From.GetJobTitle]的职责。

此致，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
To the most respectable [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

Due to the affliction spreading through [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] I have been forced to seclude myself with my court at [From.Location.GetName]. Thus I unfortunately cannot fulfill my duties as [From.GetJobTitle] until the crisis is over.

Signed, [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致可敬的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

由于在[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]不断扩散的灾祸，我被迫在[From.Location.GetName]的宫廷中被隔离，因此，很不幸，直到此次危机结束之前我将不能履行作为[From.GetJobTitle]的职责。

此致，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I never should have put that [GetRootFromInsult] on my council!
translation: 我就不该让那个[GetRootFromInsult]待在我的内阁里！

original: Regrettable, although understandable...
translation: 令人遗憾，虽然可以理解……

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has returned to my court and council. [From.GetSheHeCap] is yet again able to carry out [From.GetHerHis] duties as [From.GetJobTitle].
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!回到了我的宫廷和内阁。[From.GetSheHeCap]作为[From.GetJobTitle]又一次能够执行[From.GetHerHis]职责。

original: There are many deities whom you can chose to follow. Great Ukko, God of the Sky and the bringer of good harvests, or his wife Akka, Goddess of love and protection. Perhaps you will pray to Tapio and Mielikki, Master and Mistress of the Hunt. You may also dedicate your worship to the sly tempter Lempo...
translation: 有很多神供你选择敬拜。伟大的乌戈、天神和带来丰收者，或是他的妻子，爱与保护之女神阿卡？也许你愿向狩猎之主夫妻塔皮奥和米耶利基祈祷？你也可以向狡猾的引诱者伦波致以崇敬……

original: Ukko rules over them all!
translation: 乌戈统领一切！

original: I am one of Akka's children. May she protect me.
translation: 我是阿卡的孩子，愿她保护我。

original: Tapio and Mielikki shall bring me good fortune in the forest!
translation: 塔皮奥和米耶利基会在森林中给我带来财富！

original: May Lempo bestow their secrets upon me.
translation: 愿伦波授予我祂的秘密。

original: The domain of the great and mighty Ukko is the heavens. He rules over the weather and brings us good harvests. As he rides in his chariot, swinging his great hammer, he sends lightning bolts across the sky. As the chief of all gods, he grants his followers guidance in their rule and prosperity in their realm.
translation: 伟大强力的乌戈的领地是天堂。他统管天气，带来丰收。当他驾驭战车、挥舞大锤时，就会在天空中激发闪电。作为众神首领，他授予信徒统治的指引和国土的繁荣。

original: Akka, Goddess of love, fertility and protection, is a gentle yet powerful mistress. She cares for all of her children, although especially mothers and infants. When thunder echoes between the mountains, it is Akka making love with her husband, the chief god Ukko.
translation: 爱、生育与保护的女神阿卡温柔而强大。她关怀所有儿女，特别是母亲和幼儿。闪电划过群山，那是阿卡和众神之首领、丈夫乌戈在欢好。

original: The woods are ruled by Tapio and Mielikki, God and Goddess of the Hunt. Those who pledge their allegiance to them shall always be blessed with true aim and strength of body. Mielikki is also a most accomplished healer and has a vast knowledge of all the herbs in the forest.
translation: 狩猎之神塔皮奥和狩猎女神米耶利基管辖林木，保佑向他们誓言效忠的人百发百中、身强体健。米耶利基也是最娴熟的治愈者，拥有森林一切草药的广博知识。

original: Those who worship Lempo has chosen an erratic Master. While they may share many secrets regarding love and seduction, know that matters of the heart can be as dangerous as those of the sword. However, if you keep your wits about you, Lempo's lessons shall bring you power and influence beyond comprehension.
translation: 敬拜伦波者选择了一位难以捉摸的主人。祂可能分享爱与魅惑的秘密，同时这些心灵的事情又可能比剑术还危险。但是，若你能保持智慧，伦波的教诲就能给你带来超乎想象的权力和影响。

original: Follower of Ukko
translation: 乌戈的信徒

original: This character is a devout follower of Ukko, the Suomenusko deity of the sky and harvests.
translation: 这名角色是索米信仰中天空与丰收之神乌戈的虔诚信徒。

original: Follower of Akka
translation: 阿卡的信徒

original: This character is a devout follower of Akka, the Suomenusko deity of motherhood, protection and love.
translation: 这名角色是索米信仰中母亲、保护和爱之女神阿卡的虔诚信徒。

original: Follower of Tapio and Mielikki
translation: 塔皮奥和米耶利基的信徒

original: This character is a devout follower of Tapio and Mielikki, the Suomenusko deities of forests, hunting and healing.
translation: 这名角色是索米信仰中森林、狩猎和治愈之神塔皮奥和米耶利基的虔诚信徒。

original: Follower of Lempo
translation: 伦波的信徒

original: This character is a devout follower of Lempo, the Suomenusko deity of seduction and love.
translation: 这名角色是索米信仰中爱与魅惑之神伦波的虔诚信徒。

original: There are many deities whom you can chose to follow. The supreme ruler, our Father Dievas, or his ambitious brother Velnias, God of the Underworld. For luck in war, pray to Perkunas, God of Thunder. Zemyna, the Earth Goddess, blesses her faithful with fertility and good harvests.
translation: 有许多神灵可供敬拜。至高的统治者、我们的天父季耶瓦斯，或者他野心勃勃的兄弟、冥神维尔尼阿斯。寻求战争中的好运，向雷神佩尔库那斯祈祷。大地女神泽米娜保佑她的虔诚信徒以生育和丰收。

original: Good Dievas, I shall serve you faithfully.
translation: 善良的季耶瓦斯，我将虔诚侍奉您。

original: Velnias, share the secrets of death with me!
translation: 维尔尼阿斯，告诉我死亡的秘密吧！

original: I will bring you honor on the battlefield, mighty Perkunas!
translation: 佩尔库那斯，我将在战场献给你荣誉！

original: My prayers go to bountiful Zemyna.
translation: 我的祈祷献给慷慨的泽米娜。

original: Dievas, our Father, is the supreme ruler of all Gods and Goddessess. He has created all that which is good and wonderful in this world, including us. His rule is one of peace and understanding, and those are his gifts to faithful followers.
translation: 季耶瓦斯，我们的父，是诸神的至高主宰。他创造了此世所有好的、令人赞叹的东西，包括我们。他的统治和谐而通情达理，这是他赐予忠实信徒的礼物。

original: Velnias the Serpent is God of Death and the Underworld. He is the brother of Dievas and the enemy of Perkunas. He can shapeshift into various animals, conjure up storms, and is a master of chaos and deception. Beware those who have been given his powers.
translation: 巨蛇维尔尼阿斯是死神和冥神。他是季耶瓦斯的兄弟和宿敌。他可以变幻动物、召唤风暴，也是混沌和欺骗的大师。小心那些获取他的力量的人。

original: Perkunas is the God of Thunder. He rides the skies in his chariot, with his magical axe in his hand. His eternal enemy is Velnias the Serpent, Lord of the Underworld, whom he protects us from. Those who are faithful to Perkunas will be given his courage and success.
translation: 佩尔库那斯是雷神。他驾驶战车翱翔天空，手持魔法战斧。他从他永远的宿敌，冥神、巨蛇维尔尼阿斯之手保护我们。佩尔库纳斯的忠诚信徒会被授予他的勇气和成功。

original: The Mother, Zemyna, is the fertile earth which nourishes us all. Every man and woman, animal and plant, owe their life force to her. When our lives in her green realm is over, we return to her again, to find the endless rest in her arms.
translation: 母亲泽米娜是养育所有人的丰产大地。男人和女人，动物和植物，生命力都来自她。当我们的生命在她的绿色王国中走到尽头，就回归她的怀抱永恒休憩。

original: Follower of Dievas
translation: 季耶瓦斯的信徒

original: This character is a devout follower of Dievas, the Romuva chief deity of Peace.
translation: 这名角色是洛姆瓦教和平主神季耶瓦斯的虔诚信徒。

original: Follower of Perkunas
translation: 佩尔库纳斯的信徒

original: This character is a devout follower of Perkunas, the Romuva deity of Thunder.
translation: 这名角色是洛姆瓦教雷神佩尔库纳斯的虔诚信徒。

original: Follower of Velnias
translation: 维尔尼阿斯的信徒

original: This character is a devout follower of Velnias, the Romuva deity of Death.
translation: 这名角色是洛姆瓦教死神维尔尼阿斯的虔诚信徒。

original: Follower of Zemyna
translation: 泽米娜的信徒

original: This character is a devout follower of Zemyna, the Romuva deity of Earth and Motherhood.
translation: 这名角色是洛姆瓦教大地和母亲之神泽米娜的虔诚信徒。

original: I hope to be worthy of this blessing.
translation: 我希望我值得这份保佑。

original: You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Dievas. In his name you have promote peace and understanding between your subjects. As a result, your diplomatic skills have been improving.
translation: 你满怀虔诚，在追随季耶瓦斯的道路上苦苦辛劳。以他之名，你使臣民间和谐通达。因此，你的外交技能提高了。

original: You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Akka. In her name you have promote peace and understanding between your subjects. As a result, your diplomatic skills have been improving.
translation: 你满怀虔诚，在追随阿卡的道路上苦苦辛劳。以她之名，你使臣民间和谐通达。因此，你的外交技能提高了。

original: You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Perkunas. In his name you have practiced your axemanship and spent many hours strategizing at the war table with your commanders. As a result, your martial skills have been improving.
translation: 你满怀虔诚，在追随佩尔库纳斯的道路上苦苦辛劳。以他之名你训练你的用斧技巧，并花大量时间与你的指挥官在沙盒边运筹帷幄。因此，你的军事技能提高了。

original: You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Tapio and Mielikki. In their name you have arranged a number grand hunts as well as spent many solitary hours tracking in the wilderness. As a result, your martial skills have been improving.
translation: 你满怀虔诚，在追随塔皮奥和米耶利基的道路上苦苦辛劳。以他们之名，你安排大型狩猎、频频在荒野中追踪。因此，你的军事技能提高了。

original: You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Perun. In his name you have practiced your axemanship and spent many hours strategizing at the war table with your commanders. As a result, your martial skills have been improving.
translation: 你满怀虔诚，在追随佩龙的道路上苦苦辛劳。以他之名，你锻炼斧术，在沙盒边和将领运筹帷幄。因此，你的军事技能提高了。

original: You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Zemyna. In her name you have arranged harvest festivals and fertility rites, as well as spent many hours inspecting the fields of [Root.Capital.GetName]. As a result, your stewardship skills have been improving.
translation: 你满怀虔诚，在追随泽米娜的道路上苦苦辛劳。你已经以她的名义筹备了收获的祭典与丰产的仪式，并花费了大量的时间巡查[Root.Capital.GetName]的土地。因此，你的财政能力提高了。

original: You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Ukko. In his name you have arranged harvest festivals and fertility rites, as well as spent many hours inspecting the fields of [Root.Capital.GetName]. As a result, your stewardship skills have been improving.
translation: 你满怀虔诚，在追随乌戈的道路上苦苦辛劳。你已经以他的名义筹备了收获的祭典与丰产的仪式，并花费了大量的时间巡查[Root.Capital.GetName]的土地。因此，你的财政能力提高了。

original: You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Jarilo. In his name you have arranged harvest festivals and fertility rites, as well as spent many hours inspecting the fields of [Root.Capital.GetName]. As a result, your stewardship skills have been improving.
translation: 你满怀虔诚，在追随亚力洛的道路上苦苦辛劳。以他之名，你筹备了收获的祭典与丰产的仪式，并花费了大量的时间巡查[Root.Capital.GetName]的土地。因此，你的财政能力提高了。

original: You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Velnias. In his name you have plotted and spied, brewed poisons and manipulated. As a result, your skills of intrigue have been improving.
translation: 你满怀虔诚，在追随维尔尼阿斯的道路上苦苦辛劳。以他之名，你密谋、刺探、制毒、操控。因此，你的密谋技能提高了。

original: You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Lempo. In their name you have woven enchanting tales and spun sweet promises, seduced the longing and bedded the lusting. As a result, your skills of intrigue have been improving.
translation: 你满怀虔诚，在追随伦波的道路上苦苦辛劳。以他之名，你编造醉人童话，纺织甜美承诺，诱导思慕之情，纵情床笫之欢。因此，你的密谋技能提高了。

original: You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Veles. In his name you have plotted and spied, brewed poisons and manipulated. As a result, your skills of intrigue have been improving.
translation: 你满怀虔诚，在追随维列斯的道路上苦苦辛劳。以他之名，你你密谋、刺探、制毒、操控。因此，你的密谋技能提高了。

original: You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Morana. In her name you have sought out knowledge and secrets, both in the earthly realm and in her domain, the dream lands. As a result, your learning has been improving.
translation: 你满怀虔诚，在追随莫拉娜的道路上苦苦辛劳。以她之名，你寻求知识和奥秘，既在尘世，也在她的梦之国土中。因此，你的学识提高了。

original: [From.GetFirstName], we should talk some more!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]，我们应该再多谈一谈！

original: Continue the conversation with §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 继续与§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!交谈。\n

original: Actually, it is time to continue.
translation: 确实，是时候继续了。

original: It is early morning and you are at the shrine dedicated to Morana, deep in prayers. You hear soft footsteps behind you - who could it be at this hour? [From.GetTitledFirstName], as it turns out. You exchange some pleasantries and soon you find yourself in a full-fledged conversation. You have so much in common!
translation: 清晨，你来到莫拉娜的神殿，深深地祈祷。你听到身后有轻柔的脚步声——这个时间会是谁呢？[From.GetTitledFirstName]现出身影，你们互相客套了一下，很快便浸入了交谈之中。你们有着如此之多的共识！

original: It is a fine day and you are out hunting with a small party. As you take a break to eat your midday meal, you find yourself in a discussion on archery with [From.GetTitledFirstName]. It turns out that [From.GetSheHe] is also a devout follower of Perun. The longer you talk the more you seem to have in common!
translation: 一个好天气，你带着一支小队外出打猎。当你停下休息片刻并享受午餐时，你开始与[From.GetTitledFirstName]进行一次有关箭术的讨论，结果发现[From.GetSheHe]也是一名佩伦的虔信者。随着交谈的深入，你发现你们的共同点越来越多。

original: It is a fine day and you are out hunting with a small party. As you take a break to eat your midday meal, you find yourself in a discussion on archery with [From.GetTitledFirstName]. It turns out that [From.GetSheHe] is also a devout follower of Perkunas. The longer you talk the more you seem to have in common!
translation: 一个好天气，你带着一支小队外出打猎。当你停下休息片刻并享受午餐时，你开始与[From.GetTitledFirstName]进行一次有关箭术的讨论，结果发现[From.GetSheHe]也是一名佩尔库纳斯的虔信者。随着交谈的深入，你发现你们的共同点越来越多。

original: It is a fine day and you are out hunting with a small party. As you take a break to eat your midday meal, you find yourself in a discussion on archery with [From.GetTitledFirstName]. It turns out that [From.GetSheHe] is also a follower of Tapio and Mielikki. The longer you talk the more you seem to have in common!
translation: 一个好天气，你带着一支小队外出打猎。当你停下休息片刻并享受午餐时，你开始与[From.GetTitledFirstName]进行一次有关箭术的讨论，结果发现[From.GetSheHe]也是一名达比奥的虔信者。随着交谈的深入，你发现你们的共同点越来越多。

original: Many find it odd that a [Root.GetTitle] works in the fields, but tending to the land and crops make you feel closer to Ukko, more so than any prayer. As you take a short break, you notice [From.GetTitledFirstName] approaching. You greet and exchange some words about the harvest. It turns out that [From.GetSheHe] is also a follower of Ukko!
translation: 许多人奇怪地发现一位[Root.GetTitle]在田地里劳作，但亲近土地与农作物能使你与乌戈更亲近，比任何形式的祈祷都管用。当你稍作休息时，你看到[From.GetTitledFirstName]靠了过来，你们互相打了招呼，并交谈了有关丰收的话题。原来[From.GetSheHe]也是一名乌戈的信徒！

original: Many find it odd that a [Root.GetTitle] works in the fields, but tending to the land and crops make you feel closer to Zemyna, more so than any prayer. As you take a short break, you notice [From.GetTitledFirstName] approaching. You greet and exchange some words about the harvest. It turns out that [From.GetSheHe] is also a follower of Zemyna!
translation: 许多人奇怪地发现一位[Root.GetTitle]在田地里劳作，但亲近土地与农作物能使你与泽米娜更亲近，比任何形式的祈祷都管用。当你稍作休息时，你看到[From.GetTitledFirstName]靠了过来，你们互相打了招呼，并交谈了有关丰收的话题。原来[From.GetSheHe]也是一名泽米娜的信徒！

original: Many find it odd that a [Root.GetTitle] works in the fields, but tending to the land and crops make you feel closer to Jarilo, more so than any prayer. As you take a short break, you notice [From.GetTitledFirstName] approaching. You greet and exchange some words about the harvest. It turns out that [From.GetSheHe] is also a follower of Jarilo!
translation: 许多人奇怪地发现一个[Root.GetTitle]在田地里劳作，但亲近土地与农作物能使你与亚力洛更亲近，比任何形式的祈祷都管用。当你稍作休息时，你看到[From.GetTitledFirstName]靠了过来，你们互相打了招呼，并交谈了有关丰收的话题。原来[From.GetSheHe]也是一名亚力洛的信徒！

original: It is early morning and you are at the shrine dedicated to Akka, deep in prayers. You hear soft footsteps behind you – who could it be at this hour? [From.GetTitledFirstName], as it turns out. You exchange some pleasantries and soon you find yourself in a full-fledged conversation. You have so much in common!
translation: 清晨，你来到阿卡的神殿，深深地祈祷。你听到身后有轻柔的脚步声——这个时间会是谁呢？[From.GetTitledFirstName]现出身影，你们互相客套了一下，很快便浸入了交谈之中。你们有着如此之多的共识！

original: It is early morning and you are at the shrine dedicated to Dievas, deep in prayers. You hear soft footsteps behind you – who could it be at this hour? [From.GetTitledFirstName], as it turns out. You exchange some pleasantries and soon you find yourself in a full-fledged conversation. You have so much in common!
translation: 清晨，你来到季耶瓦斯的神殿，深深地祈祷。你听到身后有轻柔的脚步声——这个时间会是谁呢？[From.GetTitledFirstName]现出身影，你们互相客套了一下，很快便浸入了交谈之中。你们有着如此之多的共识！

original: When you needed an accomplice in a small scheme, [From.GetTitledFirstName] proved to be an unexpected ally. Think what mutual benefits can do to unite two souls! While it was pure business at first, it turns out you have plenty in common, such as your reverence of Veles. Now you spend more time conversing than plotting...
translation: 你的一个小计划需要一个共谋者，结果[From.GetTitledFirstName]成了你意想不到的盟友。想想这样的互惠将怎样使两个灵魂走向联合！一开始这仅仅只是单纯的交易，但很快你们就发现了许多共同点，比如你们对维列斯的信仰。现在你们每天花费了更多的时间交谈和密谋……

original: When you needed an accomplice in a small scheme, [From.GetTitledFirstName] proved to be an unexpected ally. Think what mutual benefits can do to unite two souls! While it was pure business at first, it turns out you have plenty in common, such as your reverence of Lempo. Now you spend more time conversing than plotting...
translation: 你的一个小计划需要一个共谋者，结果[From.GetTitledFirstName]成了你意想不到的盟友。想想这样的互惠将怎样使两个灵魂走向联合！一开始这仅仅只是单纯的交易，但很快你们就发现了许多共同点，比如你们对伦波的信仰。现在你们每天花费了更多的时间交谈和密谋……

original: When you needed an accomplice in a small scheme, [From.GetTitledFirstName] proved to be an unexpected ally. Think what mutual benefits can do to unite two souls! While it was pure business at first, it turns out you have plenty in common, such as your reverence of Velnias. Now you spend more time conversing than plotting...
translation: 你的一个小计划需要一个共谋者，结果[From.GetTitledFirstName]成了你意想不到的盟友。想想这样的互惠将怎样使两个灵魂走向联合！一开始这仅仅只是单纯的交易，但很快你们就发现了许多共同点，比如你们对维尔尼阿斯的信仰。现在你们每天花费了更多的时间交谈和密谋……

original: Struck by Lightning
translation: 遭到雷击

original: This character was struck by lightning!
translation: 这个角色曾被雷击！

original: Comforted
translation: 受到安慰

original: Tough Love
translation: 严厉的爱

original: You sit huddled up together by the fire, the air thick with tension. The skies outside are dark with heavy clouds and Perun's presence is as tangible as the rain smattering on the roof. Suddenly, the room is lit by a bright flash and an ear-deafening crack cuts through the silence. Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] breaks into tears.
translation: 你们蜷缩在火堆旁，空气中弥漫着紧张的氛围。外面天空昏暗，黑云密布，佩伦的存在感如屋顶上击打的雨点一般真实。突然，一道闪电照亮了房间，震耳欲聋的雷声打破了宁静。你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]开始放声大哭。

original: You sit huddled up together by the fire, the air thick with tension. The skies outside are dark with heavy clouds and Perkunas' presence is as tangible as a lover's touch. Suddenly, the room is lit by a bright flash and an ear-deafening crack cuts through the silence. Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] breaks into tears.
translation: 你们蜷缩在火堆旁，空气中弥漫着紧张的氛围。外面天空昏暗，黑云密布，佩尔库纳斯的存在感如爱人的触摸一般真实。突然，一道闪电照亮了房间，震耳欲聋的雷声打破了宁静。你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]开始放声大哭。

original: You sit huddled up together by the fire, the air thick with tension. The skies outside are dark with heavy clouds and Ukko's presence is as tangible as a lover's touch. Suddenly, the room is lit by a bright flash and an ear-defening crack cuts through the silence. Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] breaks into tears.
translation: 你们蜷缩在火堆旁，空气中弥漫着紧张的氛围。外面天空昏暗，黑云密布，乌戈的存在感如爱人的触摸一般真实。突然，一道闪电照亮了房间，震耳欲聋的雷声打破了宁静。你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]开始放声大哭。

original: Fear not, for the God of Thunder is our protector!
translation: 不必害怕，雷神是我们的保护者！

original: Run out into the storm to prove to §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! that thunder is nothing to worry about.\n
translation: 冲进风暴之中以向§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!证明雷电没什么可怕的。\n

original: Let me tell you a story...
translation: 我来给你讲个故事吧……

original: You tell §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! a story about the mighty God of Thunder.\n
translation: 给§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!讲一个有关强大的雷神的故事。\n

original: Your cowardice shames you, [From.GetFirstName]!
translation: 你的怯懦真是可耻，[From.GetFirstName]！

original: Scold §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! for [From.GetHerHis] cowardice.\n
translation: 因为[From.GetHerHis]懦弱而辱骂§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!。\n

original: You are dancing at the fertility rite held in Jarilo's honor as your eyes find [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s across the bonfire. For a moment, it is as if the whole world turns silent. The drumming is a distant thunder, yet the rhythmic vibrations run through your body, to your very core...
translation: 你在以亚力洛之名举办的丰产仪式上跳舞时看到[From.GetTitledFirstName]跨过了篝火。一瞬间，整个世界似乎都宁静了，击鼓声变成了遥远的响雷，有节奏的震动深入你的身躯，直入骨髓……

original: You are dancing at the secret rite held in Lempo's honor as your eyes find [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s across the bonfire. For a moment, it is as if the whole world turns silent. The drumming is a distant thunder, yet the rhythmic vibrations run through your body, to your very core...
translation: 你在以伦波之名举办的丰产仪式上跳舞时看到[From.GetTitledFirstName]跨过了篝火。一瞬间，整个世界似乎都宁静了，击鼓声变成了遥远的响雷，有节奏的震动深入你的身躯，直入骨髓……

original: Tonight, I shall bed [From.GetFirstName] in the name of Lempo.
translation: 今夜，我将以伦波之名与[From.GetFirstName]共寝。

original: Tonight, I shall bed [From.GetFirstName] in the name of Jarilo.
translation: 今夜，我将以亚力洛之名与[From.GetFirstName]共寝。

original: This is... something more.
translation: 这是……更进一步。

original: [From.GetFirstName]? What was I thinking!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]？我想啥呢！

original: Ignore the strange impulse and keep dancing.
translation: 无视这种冲动继续跳舞。

original: Zemyna's Blessing
translation: 泽米娜的保佑

original: This character feels blessed by the Goddess Zemyna, which has improved their marriage.
translation: 这个角色感受到泽米娜的保佑，这改善了其婚姻。

original: Akka's Blessing
translation: 阿卡的保佑

original: This character feels blessed by the Goddess Akka, which has improved their marriage.
translation: 这个角色感受到了阿卡的保佑，这改善了其婚姻。

original: Happy Parent
translation: 快乐的父母

original: Lately, you have striven to act in the spirit of Zemyna by treating your [From.GetHusbandWife] [From.GetTitledFirstName] with respect and warmth. Slowly it has changed the dynamic of your relationship, and those who are closest to you have noticed it as well.
translation: 近来，你努力着以泽米娜的精神，满怀敬意和温暖对待你的[From.GetHusbandWife][From.GetTitledFirstName]。你们之间的关系开始变得更有活力，而那位与你最亲近的人也注意到了这一点。

original: Lately, you have striven to act in the spirit of Akka by treating your [From.GetHusbandWife] [From.GetTitledFirstName] with respect and warmth. Slowly it has changed the dynamic of your relationship, and those who are closest to you have noticed it as well.
translation: 近来，你努力着以阿卡的精神，满怀敬意和温暖对待你的[From.GetHusbandWife][From.GetTitledFirstName]。你们之间的关系开始变得更有活力，而那位与你最亲近的人也注意到了这一点。

original: Praised be the Goddess!
translation: 赞美女神！

original: Yet I cannot bring myself to touch [From.GetHerHim]...
translation: 但是我还是无法让自己碰[From.GetHerHim]……

original: Your [GetFromRelation], little [From.GetFirstName], has sought you out with a dead bird cradled in [From.GetHerHis] arms. With a concerned look on [From.GetHerHis] face, [From.GetFirstName] asks you what happened to the animal. Why is she not flying anymore?
translation: 你的[GetFromRelation]，小[From.GetFirstName]，带着一只蜷缩在[From.GetHerHis]臂弯中的死鸟来找你。[From.GetHerHis]脸上带着担忧的表情，[From.GetFirstName]问你这只动物怎么了。为何她不再飞翔？

original: The bird is in with Morana now, dearest [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 这只鸟去陪莫拉纳了，亲爱的[From.GetFirstName]。

original: The bird is in with Veles now, dearest [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 这只鸟去陪维列斯了，亲爱的[From.GetFirstName]。

original: The bird is in with Velnias now, dearest [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 这只鸟去陪维尔尼阿斯了，亲爱的[From.GetFirstName]。

original: Tell §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! a calming tale, hoping it will make [From.GetHerHim] more at ease with the concept of death.\n
translation: 告诉§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!一个宁静的小故事，希望这将使[From.GetHerHim]更容易接受死亡的概念。\n

original: Morana is a relentless mistress. Death awaits us all.
translation: 莫拉娜是一位无情的女神。死亡等待着我们每个人。

original: Veles is a relentless master. Death awaits us all.
translation: 维列斯是一位无情的主人。死亡等待着我们每个人。

original: Velnias is a relentless master. Death awaits us all.
translation: 维尔尼阿斯是一位无情的主人。死亡等待着我们每个人。

original: Tell §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! a honest tale, hoping it will harden [From.GetHerHim].\n
translation: 给§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!讲一个坦诚的故事，希望这能坚定[From.GetHerHim]的心志。\n

original: I'm busy, go and play with the other children...
translation: 我很忙，去跟其他小朋友玩吧……

original: Your tale seemed to calm [From.GetTitledFirstName]. As you spoke, [From.GetSheHe] listened intently, while stroking the dead bird absentmindedly. When you were done, [From.GetSheHe] asked some questions, and then you buried the little feathered body together in the gardens.
translation: 你的故事看上去让[From.GetTitledFirstName]平静了下来。你讲述的时候，[From.GetSheHe]入神地听着，不舍地抚摸着那只鸟的尸体。你讲完之后，[From.GetSheHe]询问了一些问题，然后你们一起把小鸟的尸体埋葬在花园里。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] listened to your tale for a while. Once it had calmed [From.GetHerHim], [From.GetSheHe] seemed to lose interest. You could see that there was no point in lecturing further, so you sent [From.GetHerHim] away to play. [From.GetFirstName] complied without protests.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]听了你的故事一阵子。这故事一让[From.GetHerHim]平静下来，[From.GetSheHe]似乎就失去了兴趣。你能看出来没必要继续长篇大论了，于是你打发[From.GetHerHim]去玩。[From.GetFirstName]一点没有意见。

original: Little [From.GetFirstName] listened in silence, a serious look on [From.GetHerHis] face. You could tell that despite [From.GetHerHis] tender age, [From.GetSheHe] did understand something of the finality of death. [From.GetFirstName] asked some questions and you could tell [From.GetSheHe] appreciated your honest answers.
translation: 小[From.GetFirstName]沉默地听完了，[From.GetHerHis]脸上露出了严肃的神情。你可以发现尽管[From.GetHerHis]年纪尚小，[From.GetSheHe]确实可以理解一些死亡的终局性。[From.GetFirstName]询问了一些问题，而且你可以认为[From.GetSheHe]很感激你坦诚的回答。

original: Little [From.GetFirstName] listened in silence, a terrified look on [From.GetHerHis] face. Towards the end, [From.GetHerHis] lip started to quiver, but you bore on. [From.GetSheHeCap] was in tears by the time you were done. Perhaps you overdid it slightly...
translation: 小[From.GetFirstName]沉默地听完了，[From.GetHerHis]脸上露出了害怕的神情。到最后，[From.GetHerHis]嘴唇开始发颤，但你坚持讲完了。[From.GetSheHeCap]已经满眼都是泪。也许你稍微做过头了……

original: [From.GetFirstName] will become an excellent disciple of Morana one day!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]终有一天会成为莫拉纳的出色门徒！

original: [From.GetFirstName] will become an excellent disciple of Veles one day!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]终有一天会成为维列斯的出色门徒！

original: [From.GetFirstName] will become an excellent disciple of Velnias one day!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]终有一天会成为维尔尼阿斯的出色门徒！

original: [From.GetFirstName] is clearly not one of Morana's chosen...
translation: [From.GetFirstName]很显然不是莫拉纳选中的人……

original: [From.GetFirstName] is clearly not one of Veles' chosen...
translation: [From.GetFirstName]很显然不是维列斯选中的人……

original: [From.GetFirstName] is clearly not one of Velnias' chosen...
translation: [From.GetFirstName]很显然不是维尔尼阿斯选中的人……

original: Your reputation as a devout follower of Perkunas has spread across the lands. Many great and seasoned warriors have since traveled to [Root.Capital.GetName] to pledge their allegiance to your cause.
translation: 你作为佩尔库纳斯忠实追随者的名声到处传遍。许多伟大老练的战士长途跋涉来到[Root.Capital.GetName]向你效忠。

original: Your reputation as a devout follower of Tapio and Mielikki has spread across the lands. Many great and seasoned warriors have since traveled to [Root.Capital.GetName] to pledge their allegiance to your cause.
translation: 你作为塔皮奥和米耶里基忠实追随者的名声到处传遍。许多伟大老练的战士长途跋涉来到[Root.Capital.GetName]向你效忠。

original: Your reputation as a devout follower of Perun has spread across the lands. Many great and seasoned warriors have since traveled to [Root.Capital.GetName] to pledge their allegiance to your cause.
translation: 你作为佩龙忠实追随者的名声到处传遍。许多伟大老练的战士长途跋涉来到[Root.Capital.GetName]向你效忠。

original: Praised be the Hunter and the Huntress!
translation: 赞美归于猎手和女猎手！

original: Glory to the Thunder God!
translation: 荣耀归于雷神！

original: Seasoned warriors have traveled from far and wide, to fight for the true faith.
translation: 老练的战士长途跋涉而来，为了真正信仰而战。

original: In your efforts to become more like the good Dievas, you have begun treating everyone who crosses your path with more understanding and respect. As a result, you have become known for your compassionate ways and noble nature. Some go as far as calling you "the Voice of Dievas".
translation: 你努力成为更好的季耶瓦斯信徒，你开始对待所有经过你领地的人更加谅解和尊重。结果就是，你开始由于你的和善以及高贵的言行变得有名。有些人甚至称呼你为「季耶瓦斯之声」。

original: In your efforts to become more like the good Akka, you have begun treating everyone who crosses your path with more understanding and respect. As a result, you have become known for your compassionate ways and noble nature. Some go as far as calling you "the Voice of Akka".
translation: 你努力成为更好的阿卡信徒，你开始对待所有经过你领地的人更加谅解和尊重。结果就是，你开始由于你的和善以及高贵的言行变得有名。有些人甚至称呼你为「阿卡之声」。

original: I am proud to bring honor to Dievas.
translation: 我很骄傲为季耶瓦斯带来了荣耀。

original: I am proud to bring honor to the Goddess.
translation: 我很骄傲为女神带来了荣耀。

original: Voice of Akka
translation: 阿卡之声

original: It is well known that this character possesses the compassion and dignity of the Goddess Akka.
translation: 众所周知，这个角色拥有阿卡女神的和善与高贵。

original: Voice of Dievas
translation: 季耶瓦斯之声

original: It is well known that this character possesses the compassion and dignity of the God Dievas.
translation: 众所周知，这个角色拥有季耶瓦斯神的和善与高贵。

original: Your efforts to make the most out Zemyna's holy soil has turned you into a true inspiration for your people. Their hard work, in combination with the fair weather which the Goddess has blessed you with, has resulted in the richest harvest in many years. Celebrations in Zemyna's honor is held in every village.
translation: 你充分使用泽米娜圣土的努力使你真正地激励了你的人民。他们努力劳作，天气也得到女神保佑，结果得到了多年以来最大的一场丰收。每个村庄都为了泽米娜的荣耀大肆庆祝。

original: Your efforts to make the most out Ukko's holy soil has turned you into a true inspiration for your people. Their hard work, in combination with the fair weather which the God has blessed you with, has resulted in the richest harvest in many years. Celebrations in Ukko's honor is held in every village.
translation: 你充分使用乌戈圣土的努力使你真正地激励了你的人民。他们努力劳作，天气也得到神的保佑，结果得到了多年以来最大的一场丰收。每个村庄都为了乌戈的荣耀大肆庆祝。

original: Your efforts to make the most out Jarilo's holy soil has turned you into a true inspiration for your people. Their hard work, in combination with the fair weather which the God has blessed you with, has resulted in the richest harvest in many years. Celebrations in Jarilo's honor is held in every village.
translation: 你充分使用亚利洛圣土的努力使你真正地激励了你的人民。他们努力劳作，天气也得到神的保佑，结果得到了多年以来最大的一场丰收。每个村庄都为了亚利洛的荣耀大肆庆祝。

original: The prosperity of [Root.Capital.GetName] is a fine sight, indeed!
translation: [Root.Capital.GetName]的繁荣确实是一个好的景象！

original: Blessed Lands
translation: 被护佑的土地

original: These lands are prosperous, which many inhabitants believe is due to a blessing from the Gods.
translation: 这篇土地非常繁荣，很多居民相信这是源自于众神的庇护。

original: Following in the footsteps of Lempo has brought you down many paths you would never otherwise tread. The things one can overhear during such journeys often prove valuable, indeed. Just recently you discovered that [god_plotter.GetTitledFirstName] is plotting against none other than yourself!
translation: 追随伦波的脚步带领你走进了许多你本不会踏入的领域。在这种旅程中你所能偷听的东西经常被证明很有价值。最近你发现了[god_plotter.GetTitledFirstName]有个针对你的阴谋！

original: Following in the footsteps of Velnias has brought you down many paths you would never otherwise tread. The things one can overhear during such journeys often prove valuable, indeed. Just recently you discovered that [god_plotter.GetTitledFirstName] is plotting against none other than yourself!
translation: 追随维尔尼阿斯的脚步带领你走进了许多你本不会踏入的领域。在这种旅程中你所能偷听的东西经常被证明很有价值。最近你发现了[god_plotter.GetTitledFirstName]有个针对你的阴谋！

original: Following in the footsteps of Veles has brought you down many paths you would never otherwise tread. The things one can overhear during such journeys often prove valuable, indeed. Just recently you discovered that [god_plotter.GetTitledFirstName] is plotting against none other than yourself!
translation: 追随维列斯的脚步带领你走进了许多你本不会踏入的领域。在这种旅程中你所能偷听的东西经常被证明很有价值。最近你发现了[god_plotter.GetTitledFirstName]有个针对你的阴谋！

original: Following in the footsteps of Lempo has brought you down many paths you would never otherwise tread. The things one can overhear during such journeys often prove valuable, indeed. Just recently you discovered that [god_plotter.GetTitledFirstName] is plotting against [god_plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]...
translation: 追随伦波的脚步带领你走进了许多你本不会踏入的领域。在这种旅程中你所能偷听的东西经常被证明很有价值。最近你发现了[god_plotter.GetTitledFirstName]有个针对[god_plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]的阴谋……

original: Following in the footsteps of Velnias has brought you down many paths you would never otherwise tread. The things one can overhear during such journeys often prove valuable, indeed. Just recently you discovered that [god_plotter.GetTitledFirstName] is plotting against [god_plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]...
translation: 追随维尔尼阿斯的脚步带领你走进了许多你本不会踏入的领域。在这种旅程中你所能偷听的东西经常被证明很有价值。最近你发现了[god_plotter.GetTitledFirstName]有个针对[god_plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]的阴谋……

original: Following in the footsteps of Veles has brought you down many paths you would never otherwise tread. The things one can overhear during such journeys often prove valuable, indeed. Just recently you discovered that [god_plotter.GetTitledFirstName] is plotting against [god_plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]...
translation: 追随维列斯的脚步带领你走进了许多你本不会踏入的领域。在这种旅程中你所能偷听的东西经常被证明很有价值。最近你发现了[god_plotter.GetTitledFirstName]有个针对[god_plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]的阴谋……

original: That treacherous snake!
translation: 这条奸诈的毒蛇！

original: Perhaps I should warn [god_plot_target.GetHerHim].
translation: 也许我该警告[god_plot_target.GetHerHim]。

original: If it is the God's will.
translation: 如果这是神的旨意。

original: In your search for wisdom in the name of Morana, you have had more than one epiphany relevant to welfare of your lands. Spreading that knowledge is not only beneficial to your rule, but also a sacred duty in and of itself.
translation: 在你以莫雷纳之名追寻智慧的过程中，你多次获得了关于你土地福祉的顿悟。传播这些知识不仅有利于你的统治，本身也是一项神圣的职责。

original: The Goddess' wisdom is a bottomless well. Praised be she!
translation: 女神的智慧无穷无尽。她应得赞美！

original: Hunter's Physique
translation: 猎人的体魄

original: Due to spending a great deal of time hunting in the wilderness, this character has acquired strength and resilience, as well as a deadly aim.
translation: 由于长期在野外打猎，这名角色获得了力量与韧性，以及致命的准度。

original: After each hunt you make sure to leave an offering for Tapio and Mielikki in thanks of their great generosity. They surely must be pleased, for you have noticed that nowadays your arrows find their targets more often than they once did. You have been blessed with strength and a deadly aim.
translation: 每次打猎之后你确保留下一份给塔皮奥和米耶里基的祭品来感谢他们的慷慨。他们肯定非常满意，你注意到最近你的箭比以前更能射中想要的目标。你已经被祝福拥有力量和致命的准度。

original: May the Hunter and Huntress guide my arrows.
translation: 愿猎神和女猎神指引我的箭。

original: Building Monument
translation: 建造纪念碑

original: A significant portion of this province's able-bodied men are involved in a great building project.
translation: 该行省大部分健壮丁都参与了这项伟大工程的修建

original: Your [From.GetJobTitle], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has suggested that you build a great monument as a display of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]'s might. While such a project would surely have its benefits, it would be costly, and you would need a great number of men to construct the monument.
translation: 你的[From.GetJobTitle]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，建议你建造一座大纪念碑展示[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的力量。这项工程自有它的益处，当然也会很贵，你需要很多劳力来建筑这个纪念碑。

original: I shall erect a monument in the honor of Perkunas.
translation: 我将竖起纪念碑，纪念佩尔库纳斯。

original: I shall erect a monument in the honor of Tapio and Mielikki.
translation: 我将竖起纪念碑，纪念塔皮奥和米耶里基。

original: I shall erect a monument in the honor of Perun.
translation: 我将竖起纪念碑，纪念佩龙。

original: I shall erect a monument in the honor of Dievas.
translation: 我将竖起纪念碑，纪念季瓦耶斯。

original: I shall erect a monument in the honor of Akka.
translation: 我将竖起纪念碑，纪念阿卡。

original: I shall erect a monument in the honor of Zemyna.
translation: 我将竖起纪念碑，纪念泽米娜。

original: I shall erect a monument in the honor of Ukko.
translation: 我将竖起纪念碑，纪念乌戈。

original: I shall erect a monument in the honor of Jarilo.
translation: 我将竖起纪念碑，纪念亚利洛。

original: I shall erect a monument in the honor of Velnias.
translation: 我将竖起纪念碑，纪念维尔尼阿斯。

original: I shall erect a monument in the honor of Lempo.
translation: 我将竖起纪念碑，纪念伦波。

original: I shall erect a monument in the honor of Veles.
translation: 我将竖起纪念碑，纪念维列斯。

original: I shall erect a monument in the honor of Morana.
translation: 我将竖起纪念碑，纪念莫拉娜。

original:
When the monument is completed in one year's time, §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! receives §G250§! piety and §Y[Root.Capital.GetName]§! gets '§YHoly Monument§!' until the death of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!, giving the following effects:
Monthly piety gain: §G+10.0%§!
translation:
当纪念碑一年之后完工时，§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!将获取 §G250§! 虔诚，并且§Y[Root.Capital.GetName]§!获得「§Y神圣纪念碑§!」直到§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!去世，有以下效果：
每月虔诚增加：§G+10.0%§!

original: A monument dedicated to my house and the ancestors, what an excellent idea!
translation: 专用于我的家族和祖先的纪念碑，多棒的主意！

original:
When the monument is completed in one year's time, §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! receives §G250§! prestige and §Y[Root.Capital.GetName]§! gets '§YAncestral Monument§!' until the death of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!, giving the following effects:
Monthly prestige gain: §G+10.0%§!
translation:
当纪念碑一年之后完工时，§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!将获取 §G250§! 威望，并且§Y[Root.Capital.GetName]§!获得「§Y祖灵纪念碑§!」直到§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!去世，有以下效果：
每月威望增加：§G+10.0%§!

original: I cannot spare the gold, nor the men...
translation: 我既付不起钱，也出不了人……

original: Finally the monument is finished. It turned out just as you envisioned it, or perhaps even better. To celebrate its completion, a grand ceremony was held in house [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]'s honor, and what a ceremony indeed! Tales of it will be told for as long as the monument stands watch over [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: 终于纪念碑建成了。跟你所预想的一样，或者说甚至超出了预期。为了庆祝它的完工，人们举办了一场盛大的庆典纪念[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]家族，真是一场盛事！只要纪念碑耸立并俯瞰着[Root.Capital.GetName]整座城市，这个故事就将被代代传颂。

original: Finally the monument is finished. It turned out just as you envisioned it, or perhaps even better. To celebrate its completion, a grand ceremony was held in Perkunas' honor, and what a ceremony indeed! Tales of it will be told for as long as the monument stands watch over [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: 终于纪念碑建成了。跟你所预想的一样，或者说甚至超出了预期。为了庆祝它的完工，人们举办了一场盛大的庆典纪念佩尔库纳斯，真是一场盛事！只要纪念碑耸立并俯瞰着[Root.Capital.GetName]整座城市，这个故事就将被代代传颂。

original: Finally the monument is finished. It turned out just as you envisioned it, or perhaps even better. To celebrate its completion, a grand ceremony was held in Tapio's and Mielikki's honor, and what a ceremony indeed! Tales of it will be told for as long as the monument stands watch over [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: 终于纪念碑建成了。跟你所预想的一样，或者说甚至超出了预期。为了庆祝它的完工，人们举办了一场盛大的庆典纪念塔皮奥和米耶里基，真是一场盛事！只要纪念碑耸立并俯瞰着[Root.Capital.GetName]整座城市，这个故事就将被代代传颂。

original: Finally the monument is finished. It turned out just as you envisioned it, or perhaps even better. To celebrate its completion, a grand ceremony was held in Perun's honor, and what a ceremony indeed! Tales of it will be told for as long as the monument stands watch over [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: 终于纪念碑建成了。跟你所预想的一样，或者说甚至超出了预期。为了庆祝它的完工，人们举办了一场盛大的庆典纪念佩龙，真是一场盛事！只要纪念碑耸立并俯瞰着[Root.Capital.GetName]整座城市，这个故事就将被代代传颂。

original: Finally the monument is finished. It turned out just as you envisioned it, or perhaps even better. To celebrate its completion, a grand ceremony was held in Dievas' honor, and what a ceremony indeed! Tales of it will be told for as long as the monument stands watch over [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: 终于纪念碑建成了。跟你所预想的一样，或者说甚至超出了预期。为了庆祝它的完工，人们举办了一场盛大的庆典纪念季耶瓦斯，真是一场盛事！只要纪念碑耸立并俯瞰着[Root.Capital.GetName]整座城市，这个故事就将被代代传颂。

original: Finally the monument is finished. It turned out just as you envisioned it, or perhaps even better. To celebrate its completion, a grand ceremony was held in Akka's honor, and what a ceremony indeed! Tales of it will be told for as long as the monument stands watch over [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: 终于纪念碑建成了。跟你所预想的一样，或者说甚至超出了预期。为了庆祝它的完工，人们举办了一场盛大的庆典纪念阿卡，真是一场盛事！只要纪念碑耸立并俯瞰着[Root.Capital.GetName]整座城市，这个故事就将被代代传颂。

original: Finally the monument is finished. It turned out just as you envisioned it, or perhaps even better. To celebrate its completion, a grand ceremony was held in Zemyna's honor, and what a ceremony indeed! Tales of it will be told for as long as the monument stands watch over [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: 终于纪念碑建成了。跟你所预想的一样，或者说甚至超出了预期。为了庆祝它的完工，人们举办了一场盛大的庆典纪念泽米娜，真是一场盛事！只要纪念碑耸立并俯瞰着[Root.Capital.GetName]整座城市，这个故事就将被代代传颂。

original: Finally the monument is finished. It turned out just as you envisioned it, or perhaps even better. To celebrate its completion, a grand ceremony was held in Ukko's honor, and what a ceremony indeed! Tales of it will be told for as long as the monument stands watch over [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: 终于纪念碑建成了。跟你所预想的一样，或者说甚至超出了预期。为了庆祝它的完工，人们举办了一场盛大的庆典纪念乌戈，真是一场盛事！只要纪念碑耸立并俯瞰着[Root.Capital.GetName]整座城市，这个故事就将被代代传颂。

To celebrate its completion, a grand ceremony was held in Jarilo's honor, and what a ceremony indeed! Tales of it will be told for as long as the monument stands watch over [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: 终于纪念碑建成了。跟你所预想的一样，或者说甚至超出了预期。为了庆祝它的完工，人们举办了一场盛大的庆典纪念亚利洛，真是一场盛事！只要纪念碑耸立并俯瞰着[Root.Capital.GetName]整座城市，这个故事就将被代代传颂。

To celebrate its completion, a grand ceremony was held in Velnias' honor, and what a ceremony indeed! Tales of it will be told for as long as the monument stands watch over [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: 终于纪念碑建成了。跟你所预想的一样，或者说甚至超出了预期。为了庆祝它的完工，人们举办了一场盛大的庆典纪念维尔尼阿斯，真是一场盛事！只要纪念碑耸立并俯瞰着[Root.Capital.GetName]整座城市，这个故事就将被代代传颂。
