To celebrate its completion, a grand ceremony was held in Lempo's honor, and what a ceremony indeed! Tales of it will be told for as long as the monument stands watch over [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: 终于纪念碑建成了。跟你所预想的一样，或者说甚至超出了预期。为了庆祝它的完工，人们举办了一场盛大的庆典纪念伦波，真是一场盛事！只要纪念碑耸立并俯瞰着[Root.Capital.GetName]整座城市，这个故事就将被代代传颂。

original: Finally the monument is finished. It turned out just as you envisioned it, or perhaps even better. To celebrate its completion, a grand ceremony was held in Veles' honor, and what a ceremony indeed! Tales of it will be told for as long as the monument stands watch over [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: 终于纪念碑建成了。跟你所预想的一样，或者说甚至超出了预期。为了庆祝它的完工，人们举办了一场盛大的庆典纪念维列斯，真是一场盛事！只要纪念碑耸立并俯瞰着[Root.Capital.GetName]整座城市，这个故事就将被代代传颂。

original: Finally the monument is finished. It turned out just as you envisioned it, or perhaps even better. To celebrate its completion, a grand ceremony was held in Morana's honor, and what a ceremony indeed! Tales of it will be told for as long as the monument stands watch over [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: 终于纪念碑建成了。跟你所预想的一样，或者说甚至超出了预期。为了庆祝它的完工，人们举办了一场盛大的庆典纪念莫拉娜，真是一场盛事！只要纪念碑耸立并俯瞰着[Root.Capital.GetName]整座城市，这个故事就将被代代传颂。

original: Finally the monument is finished. It turned out just as you envisioned it, or perhaps even better. To celebrate its completion, a grand celebration was held for house [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName], and what a celebration indeed! Tales of it will be told for as long as the monument stands watch over [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: 终于纪念碑建成了。跟你所预想的一样，或者说甚至超出了预期。为了庆祝它的完工，人们举办了一场盛大的庆典纪念[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]家族，真是一场盛事！只要纪念碑耸立并俯瞰着[Root.Capital.GetName]整座城市，这个故事就将被代代传颂。

original: Never has [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] seen such a display of greatness!
translation: [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]从未见过如此荣光的展示！

original: Holy Monument
translation: 神圣纪念碑

original: The holy monument which has been erected here brings piety to the province's ruler.
translation: 神圣纪念碑已树立，将给该省份的统治者带来虔诚。

original: Ancestral Monument
translation: 祖灵纪念碑

original: The ancestral monument which has been erected here brings prestige to the province's ruler.
translation: 祖灵纪念碑已树立，将给该省份的统治者带来威望。

original: Seizing the Day
translation: 活在当下

original: This character has decided to live their life to the fullest, enjoying the small things while laughing at Death.
translation: 这名角色已经决定把生活活到极致，享受小确幸并笑对死亡。

original: Savoring the End Days
translation: 末世放纵

original: This character refuses to feel guilty about secluding themselves from the disease and hardship plaguing their domain.
translation: 这名角色拒绝为从领地中的疾病和困苦中自我隔离感到羞愧。

original: Bright-Eyed
translation: 目光长远

original: Where others see hardship, this character sees opportunity.
translation: 其他人只能看到困苦，这名角色却能发现机遇。

original: Secluded Revelry
translation: 隔离的庆典

original: Through shrewd management and creative solutions this character has made confinement a lot more tolerable for their secluded court.
translation: 通过精明的管理和创造性的方案，对于他们隔离的宫廷，这名角色把自我封闭变得可接受多了。

original: The Comforts of Confinement
translation: 紧闭中的乐事

original: Shutting the gates to [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] and secluding ourselves from the epidemic outside was not an easy decision to make and praying to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] doesn't help your conscience much. However, worrying about our fellow men and women outside has lately turned into less of an issue than dealing with the droves of impatient subjects within our own castle walls. Work is dwindling as reports from the outside become more scarce, the cooking staff have lost their enthusiasm due to the rationing, and when our nobles are not complaining about being unable to visit their families, they are visibly bored. "If there is nothing else for us to do, we could at least enjoy each other's company?" [bored_courtier_target.GetTitledName] suggests. You contemplate [bored_courtier_target.GetHerHis] words. Perhaps there is nothing wrong with wanting to savor your last days on earth?
translation: 关闭[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]的城门，把我们从外部疫情隔离开来，并不是一件容易作出的决定，即使向[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]祷告也并不能抚慰你的良心。然而，为外面的男女而担忧近来已是个次要话题，如何处理我们城墙内那群不耐烦的臣民更加棘手。工作随着外部报告越发稀缺而渐渐减少，厨子们因为配给制度失去了热情，我们的贵族虽然没有因为无法走亲访友而抱怨，但是看得出他们很无聊。「如果没有别的事情可做，至少可以在互相陪伴中尽情欢乐？」[bored_courtier_target.GetTitledName]如此建议道。你考虑了一下[bored_courtier_target.GetHerHis]话。也许在末日狂欢放纵一下并没什么坏处？

original: Shutting the gates to [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] and secluding ourselves from the epidemic outside was not an easy decision to make and you often wonder how your people fare without you. However, worrying about our fellow men and women outside has lately turned into less of an issue than dealing with the droves of impatient subjects within our own castle walls. Work is dwindling as reports from the outside become more scarce, the cooking staff have lost their enthusiasm due to the rationing, and when our nobles are not complaining about being unable to visit their families, they are visibly bored. "If there is nothing else for us to do, we could at least enjoy each other's company?" [bored_courtier_target.GetTitledName] suggests. Perhaps there is nothing wrong with wanting to savor your last days on earth?
translation: 关闭[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]的城门，把我们从外部疫情隔离开来并不是一个能够轻易作出的决定，你经常想象人民没有了你之后会遭遇些什么。然而，为外面的男女而担忧近来已是个次要话题，如何处理我们城墙内那群不耐烦的臣民更加棘手。工作随着外部报告越发稀缺而渐渐减少，厨子们因定量配给而失去了热情，我们的贵族虽然没有因为无法走亲访友而抱怨，但是看得出他们很无聊。「如果没有别的事情可做，至少可以在互相陪伴中尽情欢乐？」[bored_courtier_target.GetTitledName]如此建议道。也许在末日狂欢放纵一下并没什么坏处？

original: Shutting the gates to [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] and secluding ourselves from the epidemic outside was the practical decision to make. Your conscience clean, there is on the other hand the newly arisen problem of dealing with the droves of impatient subjects now confined to our castle. Work is dwindling as reports from the outside become more scarce, the cooking staff have lost their enthusiasm due to the rationing, and when our nobles are not complaining about being unable to visit their families, they are unnervingly bored. "If there is nothing else for us to do, we could at least enjoy each other's company?" [bored_courtier_target.GetTitledName] suggests, as you are staring idly into your favorite wall. You cock your head at [bored_courtier_target.GetHerHim], scratching your chin.
translation: 关闭[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]的城门，把我们从外部疫情隔离开来，是一个实际的决定。你良心并没有什么不安，但另一方面，新问题出现了，就是如何处理我们城墙内那群不耐烦的臣民。工作随着外部报告越发稀缺而渐渐减少，我们的贵族虽然没有因为无法走亲访友而抱怨，但是看得出他们很无聊。「如果没有别的事情可做，至少可以在互相陪伴中尽情欢乐？」[bored_courtier_target.GetTitledName]如此建议道。当时你正空洞的盯着你最喜欢的墙壁。你歪过头朝向[bored_courtier_target.GetHerHim]，抓了抓下巴。

original: Shutting the gates to [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] and secluding ourselves from the epidemic outside was the reasonable choice to make. Even if you occasionally worry about your people on the outside, another problem has arisen lately in dealing with the droves of impatient subjects now confined to the castle. Work is dwindling as reports from the outside become more scarce, the cooking staff have lost their enthusiasm due to the rationing, and when our nobles are not complaining about being unable to visit their families, they are visibly bored. "If there is nothing else for us to do, we could at least enjoy each other's company?" [bored_courtier_target.GetTitledName] suggests.\nYou scratch your chin. One could suppose there is nothing wrong with wanting to savor your last days on earth...?
translation: 关闭[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]的城门，把我们从外部疫情隔离开来，是一件合理的决定。即使你偶尔有一些担心你领地的人民，新问题出现了，如何处理我们城墙内那群不耐烦的臣民。工作随着外部报告越发稀缺而渐渐减少，厨子们因为配给制度失去了热情，我们的贵族虽然没有因为无法走亲访友而抱怨，但是看得出他们很无聊。「如果没有别的事情可做，至少可以在互相陪伴中尽情欢乐？」[bored_courtier_target.GetTitledName]如此建议道。\n你抓了抓下巴。也许在末日狂欢放纵一下并没什么坏处？

original: Shutting the gates to [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] and secluding ourselves from the epidemic outside was not an easy decision to make. Watching your domain from your windows, you are reminded of the precarious situation. However, another issue has arisen lately in the matter of dealing with the droves of impatient subjects now confined to the castle. Work is dwindling as reports from the outside become more scarce, the cooking staff have lost their enthusiasm due to the rationing, and when our nobles are not complaining about being unable to visit their families, they are visibly bored. "If there is nothing else for us to do, we could at least enjoy each other's company?" [bored_courtier_target.GetTitledName] suggests.\nScratching your chin, you contemplate [bored_courtier_target.GetHerHis] words. If the end is coming, perhaps there is nothing wrong with wanting to savor your last days?
translation: 关闭[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]的城门，把我们从外部疫情隔离开来，并不是一件容易作出的决定。从你的窗户俯瞰你的疆土，你可以感受到眼下危险的形势。然而新问题出现了，如何处理我们城墙内那群不耐烦的臣民。工作随着外部报告越发稀缺而渐渐减少，厨子们因为配给制度失去了热情，我们的贵族虽然没有因为无法走亲访友而抱怨，但是看得出他们很无聊。「如果没有别的事情可做，至少可以在互相陪伴中尽情欢乐？」[bored_courtier_target.GetTitledName]如此建议道。\n你抓了抓下巴，考虑了一下[bored_courtier_target.GetHerHis]话。如果末日将近，狂欢放纵一下并没什么坏处？

original: [bored_courtier_target.GetSheHeCap] is right, we should try to enjoy ourselves.
translation: [bored_courtier_target.GetSheHeCap]是对的，我们要自我享受。

original: You order §Y[bored_courtier_target.GetTitledName]§! to by any means find ways to increase the spirit of the castle.\n
translation: 你命令§Y[bored_courtier_target.GetTitledName]§!去想尽一切办法来提高城堡中的士气。\n

original: We should all make an effort to find comfort here in [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName].
translation: 我们应该各自努力在[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]这里找到些乐子。

original: You order §Y[bored_courtier_target.GetTitledName]§! to not go overboard with the arrangements.\n
translation: 你命令§Y[bored_courtier_target.GetTitledName]§!排场不要太夸张。\n

original: If I can't protect my people, the least I can do is not enjoy it.
translation: 如果我不能保护我的民众，至少我不该纵情享乐。

original: You would rather be bored to death.\n
translation: 你宁可无聊至死。\n

original: I'm really not in the mood.
translation: 我真的没心情。

original: You would rather be bored to death.
translation: 你宁可无聊至死。

original: Can I invite my invisible friends, too?
translation: 我可以邀请那些我看不见的朋友吗？

original: You have been meaning to spend some quality time with them.\n§Y[bored_courtier_target.GetTitledName]§! takes this as a yes and begins preparing the castle for a more festive air.\n
translation: 你已经暗示可以你花一些时间与他们在一起。\n§Y[bored_courtier_target.GetTitledName]§!把这当成是赞同，开始给城堡准备节日的氛围。\n

original: I had a dream about this. DEATH will consume us all!
translation: 我做了关于这个的梦。死亡会吞噬我们所有人！

original: You have seen the future and refuse to be fooled.\n§Y[bored_courtier_target.GetTitledName]§! runs along, half scared of you.\n
translation: 你已经预见未来并拒绝被愚弄。\n§Y[bored_courtier_target.GetTitledName]§!跑开了，有点被你吓到。\n

original: [bored_courtier_target.GetFirstName] has really spruced things up. Windows are polished, there are new drapes in place and the fine cutlery is now brought out for every meal. There is even a lute player around and I've given free access to our wine-cellars. Admittedly, it is easy to ignore the hardship going on outside our safe-haven of [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName].
translation: [bored_courtier_target.GetFirstName]确实把事情搞得有模有样。窗户被擦亮，窗帘也是新的，每顿饭都有干净的刀具。甚至还有位鲁特琴手，而我可以自由地前往酒窖。诚然，居住在[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]的安乐窝里会很容易就忽略外面的困苦。

original: [bored_courtier_target.GetFirstName] has really spruced things up! Windows are polished, there are new drapes in place and the fine cutlery is now brought out for every meal. There is even a lute player stalking me these days, but the voice in my head says he's alright. I'm starting to think my nightmares are just nightmares. [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] is the safest place in the world.
translation: [bored_courtier_target.GetFirstName]确实把事情搞得有模有样。窗户被擦亮，窗帘也是新的，每顿饭都有干净的刀具。甚至还有位鲁特琴手这些天跟着我，但我脑子里的声音告诉我这没问题。我开始觉得我的噩梦仅仅是噩梦而已。[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]是世界上最安全的地方。

original: [bored_courtier_target.GetFirstName], perhaps you can do something about the lights?
translation: [bored_courtier_target.GetFirstName]，也许你可以对灯具做点什么？

original: You encourage §Y[bored_courtier_target.GetTitledName]§! and [bored_courtier_target.GetHerHis] staff in the lavish decorating of the castle. You continue the revelry.\n
translation: 你鼓励§Y[bored_courtier_target.GetTitledName]§!以及[bored_courtier_target.GetHerHis]手下对城堡进行盛大的装饰。你让庆典继续。

original: [bored_courtier_target.GetTitledName], you've made life in seclusion bearable.
translation: [bored_courtier_target.GetTitledName]，你让隔离中的日子可以忍受。

original: You continue the revelry.\n
translation: 你让庆典继续。\n

original: This is starting to feel distasteful.
translation: 感觉这已经不那么有趣。

original: You call off the revelry.\n
translation: 你叫停了庆典。\n

original: In spite of being cooped up in the castle while death rages on outside, the spirit of [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] has never seemed so alive. I'm having a jolly time socializing with my court, but strangely enough there seems to be more people here than before? I don't remember inviting that stranger with the mask.
translation: 尽管被困在城堡里而城外死神肆虐，[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]从未如此有生气。我正在跟我的宫廷享受一段快乐时光，但是很奇怪似乎人比以前多了？我不记得我邀请了这个戴着面罩的陌生人？

original: The strange and long period of seclusion is over and much thanks to our recent efforts the general mood of [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] has never been so great. Perhaps having survived disease through prolonged revelry does that you? However, there seems to be more people here than before. I don't remember inviting that stranger with the mask?
translation: 长久且诡异的隔离已经结束了，多亏了我们最近的努力，[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]的气氛从未这么好过。也许从如此长的隔离中幸存下来有这样的效果？然而，好像人比以前多了？我不记得我邀请了这个戴着面罩的陌生人？

original: Seclusion schmeclusion. I'm having a blast! I never knew my invisible friends would get along so well with my courtiers. There's a new one though, I think. I don't remember inviting that stranger with the mask? I want one just like it!
translation: 隔离隐居。我玩得很开心！我从未知道我隐形的朋友跟我的廷臣能相处得如此融洽。我觉得好像来了一个新的。我不记得我邀请了这个戴着面罩的陌生人？我想要一个一模一样的面罩！

original: Who is [partying_stranger.GetSheHe]?
translation: [partying_stranger.GetSheHe]是谁？

original: §Y[partying_stranger.GetFirstName]§! seems to be looking at you from behind [partying_stranger.GetHerHis] mask.\n
translation: §Y[partying_stranger.GetFirstName]§!似乎正从[partying_stranger.GetHerHis]面罩之后打量着你。\n

original: Isn't there something off about [partying_stranger.GetHerHim]?
translation: [partying_stranger.GetHerHim]是不是有什么不对劲？

original: §Y[partying_stranger.GetFirstName]§! leaves the room.\n
translation: §Y[partying_stranger.GetFirstName]§!离开了房间。\n

original: I might have to deal with that...
translation: 我也许该处理这人……

original: During yet another evening of wine-fueled relaxation I approach [bored_courtier_target.GetTitledName] just as a tall clock strikes the hour. The sound causes the lute player to halt and my courtiers to glance cautiously at each other. "Is that masked one a friend of yours?" I inquire. [bored_courtier_target.GetFirstName] shakes [bored_courtier_target.GetHerHis] head.
translation: 在另一个酒池肉林的夜晚，我走向[bored_courtier_target.GetTitledName]，正好大钟敲响了整点。钟声让鲁特琴手停止了演奏，我的廷臣则警惕地面面相觑。「那个戴面具的人是你的朋友吗？」我询问道。[bored_courtier_target.GetFirstName]摇了摇[bored_courtier_target.GetHerHis]头。

original: I'm in the middle of a staring contest with the masked stranger when I sneeze violently. The sound causes the lute player to halt and my courtiers to glance cautiously at each other. "D'you know where I can get a mask like that?" [bored_courtier_target.GetFirstName] shakes [bored_courtier_target.GetHerHis] head.
translation: 我跟戴着面具的陌生人互相盯着时打了个喷嚏。声音让鲁特琴手停止了演奏，我的廷臣警惕地则面面相觑。「你知道我在哪里可以搞到那种面具吗？」[bored_courtier_target.GetFirstName]摇了摇[bored_courtier_target.GetHerHis]头。

original: I should just talk to [partying_stranger.GetHerHim], before this turns awkward.
translation: 我应该直接跟[partying_stranger.GetHerHim]谈谈，在一切变得诡异之前。

original: You take a deep breath and decide that you will soon make time to approach the masked stranger in a casual manner.\n
translation: 你深深吸气，决定立刻自然地接近那个戴面具的陌生人。\n

original: How dare a stranger sneak into our midst like this?!
translation: 这个陌生人怎么敢这么混进我们里面？！

original: You are outraged and decide that you'll have to approach the masked stranger with fierce determination.\n
translation: 你非常生气，决定要暴力地接近那个戴面具的陌生人。\n

original: Wait...is that who I think it is?
translation: 等等……是不是我猜想中的那位？

original: There is something ethereal about the masked stranger and you think you know why.\n
translation: 戴面具的陌生人的身影有些飘渺，你觉得你知道为什么。\n

original: Actually, I think I recognize that figure...
translation: 实际上，我觉得我认出了那个人形……

original: There is something unnatural about the stranger and you feel a mild panic rising in your chest.\n
translation: 那个陌生人有些不自然，你感到胸中一阵猛烈的恐慌。\n

original: [bored_courtier_target.GetFirstName], you're just NO help at all!
translation: [bored_courtier_target.GetFirstName]，你根本没帮上忙！

original: You will simply ask the darkly clad figure yourself.\n
translation: 你将直接自己询问那个一身黑衣的人物。\n

original: [partying_stranger.GetTitledName] has apparently disappeared from court. I've had my men look for the masked stranger, but all that has been found is their mask. It apparently smelled wretchedly, so I can't blame the servant for burning it.
translation: [partying_stranger.GetTitledName]很显然从宫廷里消失了。我让我的人去寻找这个戴面具的陌生人，但是只找到了他的面具。很显然面具气味很糟糕，所以我没有责怪仆人烧了它。

original: I wonder who [partying_stranger.GetSheHe] was?
translation: 我好奇[partying_stranger.GetSheHe]到底是谁？

original: You can't put your finger on why, but you are relieved.\n
translation: 你不知道为什么，但是你感到宽慰下来。\n

original: I make my way deeper into the hall where the mysterious [partying_stranger.GetManWoman] usually stands alone, a figure veiled in candlelight shadows. "Have we met?" I employ my most disarming smile - I wasn't made [Root.GetTitle] for naught! The stranger remains silent. That's when I notice the smell and I grow cold.
translation: 我走进大厅深处，在那里神秘的[partying_stranger.GetManWoman]常常独自矗立，身影隐藏在烛光的阴影下。「我们见过面吗？」我摆出最人畜无害的笑容——我并不是无缘无故成为[Root.GetTitle]！陌生人保持沉默，那时我注意到那个味道，我浑身冰冷。

original: Wait, are those... buboes on your skin?
translation: 等等，你身上那些……是脓包吗？

original: Something strange happens.\n
translation: 有些奇怪的事情发生了。\n

original: Something terrible happens.\n
translation: 有些可怕的事情发生了。\n

original: "YOU!", I call one final evening, pointing at the masked figure. [partying_stranger.GetSheHeCap] is standing in the middle of a room, seemingly with an invisible aura repelling any company. As I get closer I understand why - the smell makes me convulse, but the [partying_stranger.GetManWoman] says nothing.
translation: 「你！」，我在最后一晚叫住那人，指着这个带着面具的身影。[partying_stranger.GetSheHeCap]站在房间的中央，看上去身边有道无形的光环把所有人拒之千里之外。我走近他时才发觉原因所在——那味道让我抽搐，但是这[partying_stranger.GetManWoman]什么也不说。

original: Who... WHAT are you?
translation: 你是什么人……你是什么东西？

original: Something strange happens.\n
translation: 有些奇怪的事情发生了。\n

original: The stranger seems curious and then taken aback as I approach. [partying_stranger.GetSheHeCap] tilts [partying_stranger.GetHerHis] head at me, questioningly. "Death, I presume?". The darkly clad figure shrugs, expression unreadable under the mask. Then [partying_stranger.GetSheHe] lunges at me while my courtiers gasp in horror.
translation: 陌生人看起来有些好奇，在我接近时往后退。[partying_stranger.GetSheHeCap]斜过[partying_stranger.GetHerHis]头怀疑地看向我。「我猜，你是死神？」。黑衣笼罩的身影耸了耸肩，人们无法从面具后面看到表情。然后[partying_stranger.GetSheHe]冲向我，而我的廷臣因为恐惧倒吸一口凉气。

original: The stranger tilts [partying_stranger.GetHerHis] head at me as I approach. I attempt a reassuring smile. "You look like you could use a walk", I say, offering up my arm. Hesitantly, the darkly clad figure takes it. My heart pounding, I lead [partying_stranger.GetHerHim] away from my courtiers. [partying_stranger.GetHerHisCap] grip is cold as ice.
translation: 当我接近时，陌生人斜过[partying_stranger.GetHerHis]头看向我。我尝试着摆出一副安慰的微笑。「你看上去可以跟我一起散步」，我说道，伸出我的手臂。黑暗的身影犹豫着接过我的手。我的心脏狂跳，我把[partying_stranger.GetHerHim]从我的廷臣身边带离。[partying_stranger.GetHerHisCap]手跟冰一样冷。

original: The stranger tilts [partying_stranger.GetHerHis] head at me as I approach. "That is a beautiful mask!" I call to [partying_stranger.GetHerHim]. As if by challenge, the stranger reaches up to [partying_stranger.GetHerHis] face and removes the mask, revealing a ghastly black hole where [partying_stranger.GetHerHis] face should be.
translation: 当我接近时，陌生人斜过[partying_stranger.GetHerHis]头看向我。「这面具真漂亮！」我跟[partying_stranger.GetHerHim]说道。似乎因为被挑衅，陌生人把手伸向[partying_stranger.GetHerHis]取下了面具，那里只有一个阴森的黑洞，在原本[partying_stranger.GetHerHis]脸应该在的位置。

original: Oh, this is not good.
translation: 哦，这看起来不太妙。

original: You, uhm, come here often?
translation: 你，嗯，经常来这吗？

original: The masked stranger remains quiet.\n
translation: 戴面具的陌生人保持沉默。\n

original: Oh, you look just like in my vision!
translation: 哦，你长得跟我想象的一样！

original: The masked stranger remains still, but doesn't seem entirely satisfied with your reaction.\n
translation: 戴面具的陌生人保持不动，但看上去对你的反应并不是完全满意。\n

original: Behind the Mask of Death
translation: 死神的面具之下

original: "Watch out, my [Root.GetLordLady]!", [bored_courtier_target.GetFirstName] yells as the mysterious [partying_stranger.GetManWoman] reaches for you. The words ring out as you struggle to protest the motion of [partying_stranger.GetHerHis] hand and your companions gasp in horror when the blackened fingers of the creature seem to stretch into your chest itself. You throw your head back and scream as a sharp pain runs like lightning through your entire body. As you collapse to your knees you hear others screaming as well, an unholy mixture of outrage, sorrow and panic. With your last breaths you turn to see the people of your court falling to the floor as well, red light flooding the room.\n\nAnd then all was quiet.
translation: 「当心，我的[Root.GetLordLady]！」，[bored_courtier_target.GetFirstName]尖叫着，当神秘的[partying_stranger.GetManWoman]走近你。这句话刚刚说出口，你挣扎着想要避开[partying_stranger.GetHerHis]手的动作。你的同伴因为恐惧倒吸一口凉气，那生物黑色的手指看上去要直接伸进你的胸膛。你仰起头尖叫，因为尖锐的疼痛像闪电一样刺进你整个身体。当你屈膝倒下时你听见其他人也在尖叫，混杂着愤怒，哀伤和恐慌。你咽下最后一口气之前你看到你的廷臣也倒在了地上，红色的鲜血淹没了整个房间。\n\n然后一切安静下来。

original: "Watch out, my [Root.GetLordLady]!", [bored_courtier_target.GetFirstName] yells as the mysterious [partying_stranger.GetManWoman] reaches for you. The words ring out as you struggle to protest the motion of [partying_stranger.GetHerHis] hand and your companions gasp in horror when the blackened fingers of the creature seem to stretch into your chest itself. You throw your head back and scream as a sharp pain runs like lightning through your entire body. As you collapse to your knees you hear others screaming as well, an unholy mixture of outrage, sorrow and panic. With your last breaths you turn to see the people of your court falling to the floor as well, red light flooding the room.\n\nAnd then all was quiet.
translation: 「当心，我的[Root.GetLordLady]！」，[bored_courtier_target.GetFirstName]尖叫道，神秘的[partying_stranger.GetManWoman]向你走来。这句话刚刚说出口，你挣扎着想要避开[partying_stranger.GetHerHis]手的动作。你的同伴因为恐惧倒吸一口凉气，那生物黑色的手指看上去要直接伸进你的胸膛。你仰起头尖叫，因为尖锐的疼痛像闪电一样刺进你整个身体。当你屈膝倒下时你听见其他人也在尖叫，混杂着愤怒，哀伤和恐慌。你咽下最后一口气之前你看到你的廷臣也倒在了地上，红色的鲜血淹没了整个房间。\n\n然后一切安静下来。

original: The mysterious [partying_stranger.GetManWoman] dashes against your chest, with what you expect to be a hard push. You scream, mostly in surprise, as you realize that [partying_stranger.GetSheHe] has simply moved through you, leaving a cold sensation in your flesh. Behind you, chaos ensues as the figure moves with unnatural speed, running as a ghost through your court and its people. Black smoke trails faintly behind [partying_stranger.GetHerHim] and the screams are mingled with the sudden and loud striking of a clock, its echoes ringing in your ears as the shadowy creature turns to look at you one last time. "Seize [partying_stranger.GetHerHim]!" you yell, but no guards heed your call. As you are watching [partying_stranger.GetHerHim] the stranger becomes translucent. Before you know it, you're staring at the thin air.
translation: 神秘的[partying_stranger.GetManWoman]直扑向你的胸膛，你预料到会有猛烈的冲撞。你尖叫着，大部分是因为惊讶，然后你意识到[partying_stranger.GetSheHe]只是从你身体里穿过，在你的肉体里留下寒冷的体验。在你身后，混乱不断蔓延着，当那个身影以不寻常的速度穿行，像鬼魂一样穿越你的宫廷和廷臣。黑色的烟朦胧地跟随着[partying_stranger.GetHerHim]，尖叫声混杂着突然的钟声轰鸣，在你耳中不停回响，幻影一般的生物转过头最后一次看着你。「抓住[partying_stranger.GetHerHim]！」你尖叫着，但是没有护卫响应你的召唤。当你看着[partying_stranger.GetHerHim]时，陌生人变得半透明了。在你意识到之前，你仅仅只是盯着空气。

original: Walking side by side with [partying_stranger.GetHerHim] you are stewing over your suspicions. Would Death [partying_stranger.GetHerselfHimself] really be so brass as to show up at your court? Has the Reaper nothing better to do? Surely this is just some plague-ridden spy! Yet [partying_stranger.GetHerHis] odor really is unnaturally repugnant...\nYour ruminations are interrupted by a low hiss - it hasn't taken the mysterious [partying_stranger.GetManWoman] long to figure out your plan. The ballroom trapdoor is quite visible, even if you are not Death [partying_stranger.GetHerselfHimself] and possessing, one could presume, some measure of superior senses. By your side, you feel the nails of the creature digging into your skin, which then begins to turn black, filling with buboes. You scream.
translation: 在跟[partying_stranger.GetHerHim]并肩行走时，你开始重新思考你的怀疑。死神[partying_stranger.GetHerselfHimself]会真的就这么直接出现在你的宫廷？就没其他事好做了吗？这肯定是想传播瘟疫的间谍！然而[partying_stranger.GetHerHis]气味确实很不自然，令人厌恶……\n你的胡思乱想被一阵低低的嘶鸣声打断了——神秘的[partying_stranger.GetManWoman]没花很长时间就识破了你的计划。舞场里的陷阱门很明显，即使不是死神[partying_stranger.GetHerselfHimself]，也可以用第六感推断出来。在你身边，你感到那个生物的指甲刺入你的皮肤，那里开始变黑，被脓包充满。你开始尖叫。

original: "Oh yeah, we've met before. We had tea?", you continue. Death shakes [partying_stranger.GetHerHis] head, black smoke twirling around [partying_stranger.GetHerHim]. Your courtiers, who have been shocked into silence, are beginning to frantically move about, looking to all at once exit the room. Stumbling over one another, Death creeps towards them, as if not really in a hurry. You notice that each person [partying_stranger.GetSheHe] brushes past gently collapses to the floor, before even having time to scream or call for help. "How dare you?!" you yell, outraged at the impudence. "Those are my guests!" [partying_stranger.GetSheHeCap] then turns to you, approaching quickly in a cloud of darkness.
translation: 「啊对，我们以前见过。我们一起喝过茶？」，你接着讲道。死神摇了摇[partying_stranger.GetHerHis]头，黑色的烟雾环绕着[partying_stranger.GetHerHim]。你的廷臣，都因为震惊而说不出话来，开始疯狂地到处乱跑，想要立刻离开房间。他们被一个个绊倒，死神慢慢走向他们，看上去一点也不着急。你注意到[partying_stranger.GetSheHe]优雅经过的每个人都瘫倒在了地上，甚至还来不及尖叫求助。「你怎么敢这样？！」你叫喊道，因为他的无礼感到愤怒。「他们是我的客人！」[partying_stranger.GetSheHeCap]接着转向了你，在黑暗的烟雾中迅速地靠近。

original: Aaarrgh...
Death gets what [partying_stranger.GetSheHe] came for and leaves your court.\n
translation: 死神得到了[partying_stranger.GetSheHe]想要的，并离开了你的宫廷。\n

original: Aaarrgh...
Death gets what [partying_stranger.GetSheHe] came for and leaves your court.\n
translation: 死神得到了[partying_stranger.GetSheHe]想要的，并离开了你的宫廷。\n

original: Nooo!
translation: 不！

original: Death gets what [partying_stranger.GetSheHe] came for and leaves your court.\n
translation: 死神得到了[partying_stranger.GetSheHe]想要的，并离开了你的宫廷。\n

original: No, please! I'm too young!!!
translation: 不！求求你！我还年轻！！！

original: Your plan to trick Death fails. You die. Death leaves your court.\n
translation: 你想要戏弄死神的计划失败了。你死了。死神离开了你的宫廷。\n

original: Wait, no!!
translation: 等等，不！！

original: You die. Death leaves your court.\n
translation: 你死了。死神离开了你的宫廷。\n

original: Don't Fear the Reaper
translation: 不要害怕死神

original: "Watch out, my [Root.GetLordLady]!", [bored_courtier_target.GetFirstName] yells as the mysterious stranger reaches for you. You quickly duck out of [partying_stranger.GetHerHis] way, a motion accompanied by an appreciative gasp from your courtiers. The creature seems taken aback, but slowly spins towards you again. "Take this!" a guard bellows as a tall candelabra is thrown to you, candlelights ablaze. Hesitating for only a second, you decide to wield it as you would any fighting cane - you begin swinging the fiery weapon passionately in the direction of what you decide must be Death [partying_stranger.GetHerselfHimself]. "LEAVE this place!" you roar, ushering [partying_stranger.GetHerHim] away from the crowd. Then, in a sudden poof of black smoke, you find your opponent gone. The room grows quiet.
translation: 「当心，我的[Root.GetLordLady]！」，[bored_courtier_target.GetFirstName]大叫道，提醒你神秘人在靠近。你迅速躲开[partying_stranger.GetHerHis]扑击，漂亮的动作让你的廷臣发出叫好声。这生物似乎吃了一惊，但还是缓慢地转向你。「接着！」一个守卫怒吼一声，向你扔出一个高大的烛台，烛火正炽。仅仅迟疑了一秒，你决定像任何一支战斗手杖一样使用它——你开始向着你认为的死神[partying_stranger.GetHerselfHimself]所在的方向激烈地挥舞这个火热的武器。「离开这里！」你咆哮道，将[partying_stranger.GetHerHim]逼离人群。接着，黑烟突然一声轻响，你发现你的敌人不见了。房间安静了下来。

original: "Watch out, my [Root.GetLordLady]!", [bored_courtier_target.GetFirstName] yells as the mysterious stranger reaches for you. You quickly duck out of [partying_stranger.GetHerHis] way, a motion accompanied by an appreciative gasp from your courtiers. The creature seems taken aback, but slowly spins towards you again. "Take this!" a guard bellows as a tall candelabra is thrown to you, candlelights ablaze. Hesitating for only a second, you decide to wield it as you would any fighting cane - you begin swinging the fiery weapon passionately in the direction of what you decide must be Death [partying_stranger.GetHerselfHimself]. "LEAVE this place!" you roar, ushering [partying_stranger.GetHerHim] away from the crowd. Then, in a sudden poof of black smoke, you find your opponent gone. The room grows quiet.
translation: 「当心，我的[Root.GetLordLady]！」，[bored_courtier_target.GetFirstName]大叫道，提醒你神秘人在靠近。你迅速躲开[partying_stranger.GetHerHis]扑击，漂亮的动作让你的廷臣发出叫好声。这生物似乎吃了一惊，但还是缓慢地转向你。「接着！」一个守卫怒吼一声，向你扔出一个高大的烛台，烛火正炽。仅仅迟疑了一秒，你决定像任何一支战斗手杖一样使用它——你开始向着你认为的死神[partying_stranger.GetHerselfHimself]所在的方向激烈地挥舞这个火热的武器。「离开这里！」你咆哮道，将[partying_stranger.GetHerHim]逼离人群。接着，黑烟突然一声轻响，你发现你的敌人不见了。房间安静了下来。

original: The sensation of being run through by Death itself is not something that you could quite explain. As it happens you inhale sharply, expecting pain to shoot through your body, expecting your vision to blur, or at least your knees to give way. When nothing happens, the ghostly apparition of a [partying_stranger.GetManWoman] turns around, throwing [partying_stranger.GetHerHis] hands out in the air, seemingly confused.\n"I guess it doesn't work on me?" you offer, something apologetic in your voice.
translation: 被死亡本身从身体里穿过的感觉你并不能很好描述。那时你猛地吸气，预期在身体被穿过时会有强烈的疼痛感，然后视野变得模糊，至少你会屈膝倒地。然而什么也没发生，那[partying_stranger.GetManWoman]的鬼魂幻影转过身，把[partying_stranger.GetHerHis]手伸在空中，看上去非常困惑。\n「我猜这对我没用？」你说道，声音带着点道歉的口气。

original: Sweat begins to trickle down the side of your brow as you get closer to your goal. You realize that the ballroom trapdoor is clearly visible, if one knows what to look for. "So the weather we've been having lately, eh?", you blabber nervously. The masked figure by your side stiffens a little before exhaling deeply, causing a cold draft through the room and your hairs to stand on end. [partying_stranger.GetSheHeCap] answers in a hollow voice: "It's such a chore, this job, honestly. It's easier when you folks make war, reaping each oth-".\nThe words are cut short as you hit the switch on the wall, sending the creature falling to your basement. A small puff of black smoke lingers by your side and your courtiers begin to clap as you drag the carpet back over the trapdoor.
translation: 当你接近你的目标时，汗水开始从额头上滚下。你发现舞厅的陷阱门太明显了，如果一个人知道要找什么。「最近这鬼天气真是简直了，是吧？」你紧张地闲聊着。戴着面具的鬼影僵住了一小会，然后深深呼了一口气，房间立刻出现一阵寒冷的穿堂风，你的头发都倒立了起来。[partying_stranger.GetSheHeCap]用空洞的声音回答道：「坦白讲这只是我的日常工作。其实可以更简单，如果你们人类发动战争，互相厮—」。\n声音戛然而止，你击中墙上的开关，送生物掉入你的地下室。一小股黑烟还徘徊在你身边，当你把地毯拖到地下室口盖住时，你的廷臣开始鼓掌。

original: "Oh yeah, we've met before. We had tea?", you continue. Death shakes [partying_stranger.GetHerHis] head, black smoke twirling around [partying_stranger.GetHerHim]. Your courtiers, who have been shocked into silence, are beginning to frantically move about, looking to all at once exit the room. Stumbling over one another, Death creeps towards them, as if not really in a hurry. "Wait!" you yell. "Can't we make a deal? I hear you like that?" Your invisible friend Jarvis nods solemnly as you offer him up to Death in exchange for the lives of your courtiers. Death appears to throw [partying_stranger.GetHerHis] head back, as if in a hearty chuckle. People stare at you in awe as the darkness suddenly leaves the room. You'll miss Jarvis, but this is exactly what happened in your dream. He knew the stakes.
translation: 「啊对，我们以前见过。我们一起喝过茶？」，你接着讲道。死神摇了摇[partying_stranger.GetHerHis]头，黑色的烟雾环绕着[partying_stranger.GetHerHim]。你的廷臣，都因为震惊而说不出话来，开始疯狂地到处跑，想要立刻离开房间。他们被一个个绊倒，死神走向他们，看上去一点也不着急。「等等！」你喊叫道。「我们不能做笔交易吗？我听说你喜欢交易？」听到你提出把他交给死神来交换你廷臣的性命，你无形的朋友贾维斯庄重地点头同意。死神似乎扬起[partying_stranger.GetHerHis]头，好像在开心地咯咯笑着。人们敬畏地看着你，黑影忽然离开了房间。你会想念贾维斯，但是这正是梦境里发生的那样，他知道代价。

original: That was close.
translation: 真是好险。

original: Death leaves your court.\n
translation: 死神离开了你的宫廷。\n

original: That was close.
translation: 真是好险。

original: Death leaves your court.\n
translation: 死神离开了你的宫廷。\n

original: Hey, it was weird for me too!
translation: 嘿，我也觉得很诡异好吗！

original: Outraged, Death leaves your court.
translation: 死神愤怒地离开了你的宫廷。

original: I really don't get to use these enough.
translation: 我真的不是很习惯这些。

original: Unsure whether you are on their to-do-list or not, it would seem that Death leaves your court for now.\n
translation: 他并不确定你是否在他的索命名单上，看上去死神暂时离开了你的宫廷。\n

original: I guess we'll meet again...
translation: 我猜我们总有一天会见面的……

original: Having struck a deal with Death, it would seem that [partying_stranger.GetSheHe] leaves your court for now.\n
translation: 跟死神达成协议之后，似乎[partying_stranger.GetSheHe]暂时离开了你的宫廷。\n

original: Kanai
translation: 忌邪者

original: Kanai is a term for a zealot or fanatic. They fight for the Jewish faith.
translation: 忌邪者即宗教狂热信徒之意。他们为犹太教信仰而战斗。

original: Gond-i Shahanshah
translation: 万王之王军团

original: Taking their name from the elite 'Army of the Shahanshah', members of the Gond-i Shahanshah are the foremost fighters of the Zoroastrian faith.
translation: 使用精锐的「万王之王的军队」作为名字，万王之王军团的成员是祆教信仰最前线的捍卫者。

original: How ominous.
translation: 多么不祥啊。

original: You are, or you believe yourself to be, a great hunter and trainer of unusual creatures. Creatures which get hungry...
translation: 你是，或者你相信你自己是，一位可以驯服非同寻常动物的伟大猎手跟驯兽师。那些动物常常会饥肠辘辘……

original: the Loyal
translation: 忠臣

original: cannibal
translation: 食人者

original: man-eating
translation: 食人的

original: You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Dongo. In his name you have practiced your spear throwing and spent many hours strategizing at the war hut with your commanders. As a result, your martial skills have been improving.
translation: 你满怀虔诚，在追随冬戈的道路上苦苦辛劳。以他之名，你勤练掷矛，在沙盒边和将领运筹帷幄。因此，你的军事技能提高了。

original: You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Bida. In his name you have traveled across the realm to inspect markets and trade routes, as well as invested in several mercantile expeditions. As a result, your stewardship skills have been improving.
translation: 你满怀虔诚，在追随碧答的道路上苦苦辛劳。以他之名，你在领地巡查市场和商路，安排收获节和丰产仪式，还数次投资商业冒险。因此，你的财政能力提高了。

original: You have toiled devoutly in your endeavor to follow the path of Tsumburbura. In her name you have sought out knowledge and purity, as well as taught and done good deeds wherever your travels have taken you. As a result, your learning has been improving.
translation: 你满怀虔诚，在追随尊布尔布拉的道路上苦苦辛劳。以她之名，你遵循教导寻求知识和纯洁，在旅途中处处与人为善。因此，你的学识提高了。

original: It is early morning and you are at the shrine dedicated to Tsumburbura, deep in prayers. You hear soft footsteps behind you - who could it be at this hour? [From.GetTitledFirstName], as it turns out. You exchange some pleasantries and soon you find yourself in a full-fledged conversation. You have so much in common!
translation: 清晨，你来到尊布尔布拉的神殿，深深地祈祷。你听到身后有轻柔的脚步声——这个时间会是谁呢？[From.GetTitledFirstName]现出身影，你们互相客套了一下，很快便浸入了交谈之中。你们有着如此之多的共识！

original: It is a fine day and you are out hunting with a small party. As you take a break to eat your midday meal, you find yourself in a discussion on archery with [From.GetTitledFirstName]. It turns out that [From.GetSheHe] is also a devout follower of Dongo. The longer you talk the more you seem to have in common!
translation: 一个好天气，你带着一支小队外出打猎。当你停下休息片刻并享受午餐时，你开始与[From.GetTitledFirstName]进行一次有关箭术的讨论，结果发现[From.GetSheHe]也是一名冬戈的虔信者。随着交谈的深入，你发现你们的共同点越来越多。

original: Many find it odd that a [Root.GetTitle] barters at the market, but it makes you feel closer to Bida, more so than any prayer. [From.GetTitledFirstName] approaches you, and the two of you exchange some words about the state of trading in [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. It turns out that [From.GetSheHe] is also a follower of Bida!
translation: 许多人奇怪地发现一位[Root.GetTitle]在市场里讨价还价，但这能使你与碧答更亲近，比任何形式的祈祷都管用。当你稍作休息时，你看到[From.GetTitledFirstName]靠了过来，你们互相打了招呼，并交谈了有关[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]贸易的话题。原来[From.GetSheHe]也是一名碧答的信徒！

original: It is early morning and you are at the shrine dedicated to Ayyur, deep in prayers. You hear soft footsteps behind you - who could it be at this hour? [From.GetTitledFirstName], as it turns out. You exchange some pleasantries and soon you find yourself in a full-fledged conversation. You have so much in common!
translation: 清晨，你来到阿库尔的神殿，深深地祈祷。你听到身后有轻柔的脚步声——这个时间会是谁呢？[From.GetTitledFirstName]现出身影，你们互相客套了一下，很快便浸入了交谈之中。你们有着如此之多的共识！

original: You sit huddled up together by the fire, the air thick with tension. The skies outside are dark with heavy clouds and Dongo's presence is as tangible as a lover's touch. Suddenly, the room is lit by a bright flash and an ear-defening crack cuts through the silence. Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] breaks into tears.
translation: 你们蜷缩在火堆旁，空气中弥漫着紧张的氛围。外面天空昏暗，黑云密布，冬戈的存在感如爱人的触摸一般真实。突然，一道闪电照亮了房间，震耳欲聋的雷声打破了宁静。你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]开始放声大哭。

original: Tsumburbura's Blessing
translation: 尊布尔布拉的保佑

original: This character feels blessed by the Goddess Tsumburbura, which has improved their marriage.
translation: 这个角色感受到尊布尔布拉的保佑，这改善了其婚姻。

original: Lately, you have striven to act in the spirit of Tsumburbura by treating your [From.GetHusbandWife] [From.GetTitledFirstName] with respect and warmth. Slowly it has changed the dynamic of your relationship, and those who are closest to you have noticed it as well.
translation: 近来，你努力着以尊布尔布拉的精神，满怀敬意和温暖对待你的[From.GetHusbandWife][From.GetTitledFirstName]。你们之间的关系开始变得更有活力，而那位与你最亲近的人也注意到了这一点。

original: Your reputation as a devout follower of Dongo has spread across the lands. Many great and seasoned warriors have since traveled to [Root.Capital.GetName] to pledge their allegiance to your cause.
translation: 你作为冬戈忠实追随者的名声到处传遍。许多伟大老练的战士长途跋涉来到[Root.Capital.GetName]向你效忠。

original: In your efforts to become more like the good Ayyur, you have begun treating everyone who crosses your path with more understanding and respect. As a result, you have become known for your compassionate ways and noble nature. Some go as far as calling you "the Voice of Ayyur".
translation: 你努力成为更好的阿库尔信徒，你开始对待所有经过你领地的人更加谅解和尊重。结果就是，你开始由于你的和善以及高贵的言行变得有名。有些人甚至称呼你为「阿库尔之声」。

original: Voice of Ayyur
translation: 阿库尔之声

original: Your efforts to make [Root.Capital.GetName] famous for its markets and merchants has paid of. The city is prospering like never before, and more people gather at the shrine of Bida each day. You have inspired many to follow his path.
translation: 你追求让[Root.Capital.GetName]以市场和商贸闻名的努力得到了回报。这座城市现在前所未有的繁荣，并且每天都有越来越多的人聚集在碧答神庙。你已经鼓励了许多人来追随他的脚步。

original: In your search for wisdom in the name of Tsumburbura, you have had more than one epiphany relevant to welfare of your lands. Spreading that knowledge is not only beneficial to your rule, but also a sacred duty in and of itself.
translation: 在你以尊布尔布拉之名追寻智慧的过程中，你多次获得了关于你土地福祉的顿悟。传播这些知识不仅有利于你的统治，本身也是一项神圣的职责。

original: I shall erect a monument in the honor of Dongo.
translation: 我将竖起纪念碑，纪念冬戈。

original: I shall erect a monument in the honor of Ayyur.
translation: 我将竖起纪念碑，纪念阿库尔。

original: I shall erect a monument in the honor of Bida.
translation: 我将竖起纪念碑，纪念碧答。

original: I shall erect a monument in the honor of Tsumburbura.
translation: 我将竖起纪念碑，纪念尊布尔布拉。

original: Finally the monument is finished. It turned out just as you envisioned it, or perhaps even better. To celebrate its completion, a grand ceremony was held in Dongo's honor, and what a ceremony indeed! Tales of it will be told for as long as the monument stands watch over [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: 终于，纪念碑建成了。整个纪念碑设计的就跟你所预想的一样，或者说甚至超出了预期。为了庆祝它的完工，人们举办了一场盛大的庆典来纪念东戈，真是一场盛事！只要纪念碑依然耸立并俯瞰着[Root.Capital.GetName]整座城市，这个故事就将被代代传颂。

original: Finally the monument is finished. It turned out just as you envisioned it, or perhaps even better. To celebrate its completion, a grand ceremony was held in Ayyur's honor, and what a ceremony indeed! Tales of it will be told for as long as the monument stands watch over [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: 终于，纪念碑建成了。整个纪念碑设计的就跟你所预想的一样，或者说甚至超出了预期。为了庆祝它的完工，人们举办了一场盛大的庆典来纪念阿库尔，真是一场盛事！只要纪念碑依然耸立并俯瞰着[Root.Capital.GetName]整座城市，这个故事就将被代代传颂。

original: Finally the monument is finished. It turned out just as you envisioned it, or perhaps even better. To celebrate its completion, a grand ceremony was held in Bida's honor, and what a ceremony indeed! Tales of it will be told for as long as the monument stands watch over [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: 终于，纪念碑建成了。整个纪念碑设计的就跟你所预想的一样，或者说甚至超出了预期。为了庆祝它的完工，人们举办了一场盛大的庆典来纪念碧答，真是一场盛事！只要纪念碑依然耸立并俯瞰着[Root.Capital.GetName]整座城市，这个故事就将被代代传颂。

original: Finally the monument is finished. It turned out just as you envisioned it, or perhaps even better. To celebrate its completion, a grand ceremony was held in Tsumburbura's honor, and what a ceremony indeed! Tales of it will be told for as long as the monument stands watch over [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: 终于，纪念碑建成了。整个纪念碑设计的就跟你所预想的一样，或者说甚至超出了预期。为了庆祝它的完工，人们举办了一场盛大的庆典来纪念尊布尔布拉，真是一场盛事！只要纪念碑依然耸立并俯瞰着[Root.Capital.GetName]整座城市，这个故事就将被代代传颂。
